recipes.name: Chicken Curry (Kukul Mas Curry)
recipes.description: A rich, aromatic chicken curry with roasted Sri Lankan spices and coconut milk
instructions: Marinate chicken with turmeric, chili powder, and salt for 30 minutes
Heat oil in a large pan and add cinnamon, cardamom, and cloves
Add curry leaves and sauté until fragrant (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Add sliced onions and cook until golden brown
Add garlic, ginger, and green chilies; sauté for 2 minutes
Add roasted curry powder and cook for 1 minute
Add marinated chicken and mix well
Pour in thin coconut milk and bring to a simmer gently (Never boil coconut milk vigorously - it will curdle)
Reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes until chicken is tender
Add thick coconut milk and simmer for 10 more minutes
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with rice
recipes.cultural_notes: This is the most popular Sri Lankan chicken curry, typically served at special occasions and family gatherings Roast curry powder in a dry pan first for authentic flavor. Use fresh curry leaves, not dried. Coconut milk should be added in two stages - thin first, thick at the end.

sinhala: ඉඟුරු ගෙඩිය කැබලි කර යුෂ ගමුකර ඇටකිරි වලින් රස වැඩි වේ
english: Use freshly roasted curry powder for best flavor

recipes.description_sinhala: බැදපු ශ්‍රී ලාංකීය කුළුබඩු සහ පොල් කිරි සමග පොහොසත්, ඇරෝමැටික චිකන් කරියක්
recipes.description_tamil: வறுத்த இலங்கை மசாலா மற்றும் தேங்காய்ப்பால் கொண்ட செழுமையான, நறுமணமுள்ள கோழிக் கறி
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: මෙය වඩාත් ජනප්‍රිය ශ්‍රී ලාංකික කුකුල් මස් ව්‍යංජනය වන අතර, සාමාන්‍යයෙන් විශේෂ අවස්ථා සහ පවුලේ රැස්වීම් වලදී පිළිගන්වනු ලැබේ
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: இது மிகவும் பிரபலமான இலங்கை கோழிக் கறியாகும், இது பொதுவாக விசேஷ சந்தர்ப்பங்களில் மற்றும் குடும்பக் கூட்டங்களில் பரிமாறப்படுகிறது

recipes.name: Dhal Curry (Parippu Curry)
recipes.description: Creamy red lentil curry with coconut milk and tempered spices
instructions: In a pot, combine lentils, water, turmeric, and salt
Bring to a boil and simmer for 20 minutes until lentils are soft
Add coconut milk and chili powder; simmer for 5 minutes
For tempering: heat oil in a small pan
Add mustard seeds and cumin; let them splutter
Add curry leaves, onions, garlic, and green chilies (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Pour tempering over the dhal curry
recipes.cultural_notes: Dhal curry is a staple in Sri Lankan cuisine, eaten daily with rice

sinhala: පරිප්පු මදි වැඩියෙන් තම්බා රස අඩු වේ
english: Don't overcook lentils or they'll become mushy

recipes.description_sinhala: පොල් කිරි සහ තෙම්පරාදු කළ කුළුබඩු සහිත ක්‍රීම් රතු පරිප්පු කරිය
recipes.description_tamil: தேங்காய் பால் மற்றும் பதப்படுத்தப்பட்ட மசாலாப் பொருட்களுடன் கிரீம் சிவப்பு பருப்பு கறி
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: පරිප්පු ව්‍යංජනය ශ්‍රී ලාංකීය ආහාරවල ප්‍රධාන ආහාරයක් වන අතර එය දිනපතා බත් සමඟ අනුභව කරනු ලැබේ
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: பருப்பு கறி இலங்கை உணவு வகைகளில் பிரதானமானது, தினமும் அரிசியுடன் உண்ணப்படுகிறது

recipes.name: Coconut Sambol (Pol Sambol)
recipes.description: Spicy coconut condiment with chili, onions, and lime
ingredients: Few curry leaves, chopped (fresh, not dried)
instructions: In a large bowl, combine grated coconut and salt
Add chili powder and mix well
Add chopped curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Squeeze lime juice over the mixture
Mix everything thoroughly with your hands
Serve immediately or store in refrigerator
recipes.cultural_notes: Pol sambol is the most essential Sri Lankan condiment, served with every meal Must be freshly made - sambol loses flavor if stored too long. Maldive fish (umbalakada) is essential and irreplaceable. Use coconut scraped fresh, not desiccated.

sinhala: අත්තම පොල් ගාලා හැදුවොත් රස වැඩි
english: Use fresh coconut for best taste
Can be stored for 2-3 days refrigerated

recipes.description_sinhala: මිරිස්, ළූණු සහ දෙහි සමග සැර පොල් කුළු බඩු
recipes.description_tamil: மிளகாய், வெங்காயம் மற்றும் சுண்ணாம்பு கொண்ட காரமான தேங்காய் கான்டிமென்ட்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: පොල් සම්බෝලය සෑම ආහාර වේලක් සමඟම පිරිනැමෙන ශ්‍රී ලංකාවේ අත්‍යවශ්‍යම කුළුබඩුවක් වේ
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: போல் சம்போல் என்பது இலங்கையின் மிகவும் அத்தியாவசியமான காண்டிமென்ட் ஆகும்

recipes.name: Fish Curry (Malu Curry)
recipes.description: A tangy fish curry with goraka (garcinia) and coconut milk
ingredients: 500g fish (tuna or mackerel), cut into pieces
instructions: Marinate fish with turmeric and salt for 15 minutes
Soak goraka in water for 10 minutes
Heat oil and sauté onions, garlic, and ginger
Add curry powder and chili powder
Add goraka water and bring to boil
Add coconut milk and curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Cook for 5 more minutes without stirring too much
recipes.cultural_notes: Goraka gives this curry its distinctive sour taste, popular in coastal regions Use fresh fish from coastal markets. Goraka (garcinia) is essential for authentic sour taste - never substitute with tamarind. The curry should have a deep red color from roasted spices.
recipes.description_sinhala: ගොරකා (ගාර්සීනියා) සහ පොල් කිරි සමග ඇඹුල් මාළු කරියක්
recipes.description_tamil: கோரக்கா (கார்சினியா) மற்றும் தேங்காய்ப்பால் கொண்ட கசப்பான மீன் குழம்பு
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ගොරකා වෙරළබඩ ප්‍රදේශවල ජනප්‍රිය මෙම ව්‍යංජනයට එහි සුවිශේෂී ඇඹුල් රසය ලබා දෙයි
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: கோரக்கா இந்த கறிக்கு அதன் தனித்துவமான புளிப்பு சுவை அளிக்கிறது, இது கடலோரப் பகுதிகளில் பிரபலமானது

recipes.name: Potato Curry (Ala Curry)
recipes.description: Simple and flavorful potato curry, an everyday Sri Lankan staple
instructions: Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add curry leaves and onions (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Add potato cubes and mix well
Add water to cover and simmer until potatoes are tender
Add coconut milk and simmer for 5 minutes
recipes.cultural_notes: A daily staple in Sri Lankan households, often served with rice and dhal
recipes.description_sinhala: සරළ සහ රසවත් අර්තාපල් ව්‍යංජනය, එදිනෙදා ශ්‍රී ලාංකික ප්‍රධාන ආහාරය
recipes.description_tamil: எளிய மற்றும் சுவையான உருளைக்கிழங்கு கறி, இலங்கையின் அன்றாட உணவாகும்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ශ්‍රී ලාංකීය නිවෙස්වල දෛනික ප්‍රධාන ආහාරය, බොහෝ විට බත් සහ පරිප්පු සමඟ සේවය කරයි
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: இலங்கை வீடுகளில் தினசரி பிரதான உணவு, பெரும்பாலும் அரிசி மற்றும் பருப்புடன் பரிமாறப்படுகிறது

recipes.name: Egg Curry (Bittara Curry)
recipes.description: Hard-boiled eggs in rich coconut gravy
instructions: Peel and halve the boiled eggs
Lightly fry eggs until golden, set aside
In same pan, sauté onions and garlic
Gently add eggs to the gravy
Garnish with curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Popular breakfast curry, often eaten with bread or roti Hard-boil eggs and lightly fry them before adding to curry for better texture and color. This is the traditional village method.
recipes.description_sinhala: පොහොසත් පොල් හොදි වල තදින් තම්බා බිත්තර
recipes.description_tamil: வளமான தேங்காய் குழம்பில் கடின வேகவைத்த முட்டைகள்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ජනප්‍රිය උදෑසන ආහාර ව්‍යංජනය, බොහෝ විට පාන් හෝ රොටි සමඟ අනුභව කරනු ලැබේ
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: பிரபலமான காலை உணவு கறி, அடிக்கடி ரொட்டி அல்லது ரொட்டியுடன் உண்ணப்படுகிறது

recipes.name: String Hoppers (Idiyappam)
recipes.description: Steamed rice noodle cakes, a breakfast favorite
instructions: Slowly add rice flour while stirring
Fill string hopper press with dough
Press onto greased molds in circular patterns
recipes.cultural_notes: Traditional breakfast served with curry and sambol
recipes.description_sinhala: තැම්බූ සහල් නූඩ්ල් කේක්, උදේ ආහාරය ප්‍රියතම එකක්
recipes.description_tamil: வேகவைத்த அரிசி நூடுல் கேக்குகள், காலை உணவுக்கு பிடித்தமானவை
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: සාම්ප්‍රදායික උදෑසන ආහාරය ව්‍යංජන සහ සම්බෝල සමඟ පිරිනමනු ලැබේ
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: பாரம்பரிய காலை உணவு கறி மற்றும் சாம்போல் பரிமாறப்பட்டது

recipes.name: Hoppers (Appa)
recipes.description: Bowl-shaped fermented rice pancakes with crispy edges
instructions: Mix yeast with warm water and sugar, let sit 10 minutes
Add yeast mixture and coconut milk
Pour batter and swirl to form bowl shape
Cover and cook until edges are crispy
recipes.cultural_notes: Often served with egg in the center for egg hoppers
recipes.description_sinhala: හැපෙනසුළු දාර සහිත බඳුනක හැඩැති පැසුණු සහල් පෑන්කේක්
recipes.description_tamil: மிருதுவான விளிம்புகளுடன் கிண்ண வடிவ புளித்த அரிசி அப்பங்கள்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: බොහෝ විට බිත්තර ආප්ප සඳහා මධ්‍යයේ බිත්තරයක් සමඟ සේවය කරයි
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: முட்டை ஹாப்பர்களுக்கு மையத்தில் முட்டையுடன் அடிக்கடி பரிமாறப்படுகிறது

recipes.name: Kottu Roti
recipes.description: Chopped roti stir-fried with vegetables and meat
instructions: Heat oil in large wok or griddle
Chop and mix everything together with metal spatulas
recipes.cultural_notes: Famous Sri Lankan street food with rhythmic chopping sounds
recipes.description_sinhala: එළවළු සහ මස් සමග කබලෙන් කපන ලද රොටි
recipes.description_tamil: காய்கறிகள் மற்றும் இறைச்சியுடன் வறுத்த நறுக்கப்பட்ட ரொட்டி
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: රිද්මයානුකූලව කපන ශබ්ද සහිත සුප්‍රසිද්ධ ශ්‍රී ලාංකික වීදි ආහාර
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: இலங்கையின் பிரபலமான தெரு உணவு, தாளமாக நறுக்கும் ஒலிகள்

recipes.name: Lamprais
recipes.description: Dutch Burgher rice packet with multiple curries baked in banana leaf
instructions: Place rice in center of leaf
Add chicken curry, beef curry, egg, moju, sambol
recipes.cultural_notes: Dutch Burgher specialty, traditionally served at parties
recipes.description_sinhala: කෙසෙල් කොළයේ පුලුස්සන ලද බහු ව්‍යංජන සහිත ලන්දේසි බර්ගර් බත් පැකට්ටුව
recipes.description_tamil: வாழை இலையில் சுடப்பட்ட பல கறிகளுடன் கூடிய டச்சு பர்கர் ரைஸ் பாக்கெட்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ලන්දේසි බර්ගර් විශේෂත්වය, සම්ප්‍රදායිකව සාදවල සේවය කරයි
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: பாரம்பரியமாக விருந்துகளில் பரிமாறப்படும் டச்சு பர்கர் சிறப்பு

recipes.name: Watalappan
recipes.description: Sri Lankan coconut custard pudding with jaggery
recipes.cultural_notes: Malay-origin dessert, essential at Eid celebrations
recipes.description_sinhala: හකුරු සමග ශ්‍රී ලංකාවේ පොල් කස්ටඩ් පුඩිං
recipes.description_tamil: வெல்லத்துடன் இலங்கை தேங்காய் கொழுக்கட்டை
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: මැලේ සම්භවයක් ඇති අතුරුපස, ඊද් උත්සවවලදී අත්‍යවශ්‍ය වේ
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: மலாய் வம்சாவளி இனிப்பு, ஈத் கொண்டாட்டங்களில் அவசியம்

recipes.name: Seeni Sambol
recipes.description: Caramelized onion sambol with Maldive fish
instructions: Add onions and fry until golden
Add curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Add chili powder and Maldive fish
recipes.cultural_notes: Essential condiment for bread, served at breakfast Must be freshly made - sambol loses flavor if stored too long. Maldive fish (umbalakada) is essential and irreplaceable. Use coconut scraped fresh, not desiccated.
recipes.description_sinhala: මාලදිවයිනේ මාළු සමග කැරමල් කළ ලූනු සම්බෝලය
recipes.description_tamil: மாலத்தீவு மீன்களுடன் கேரமல் செய்யப்பட்ட வெங்காய சாம்போல்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: පාන් සඳහා අත්‍යවශ්‍ය කුළුබඩුවක්, උදේ ආහාරය සඳහා සේවය කරයි
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: ரொட்டிக்கு அத்தியாவசியமான காண்டிமென்ட், காலை உணவில் பரிமாறப்படுகிறது

recipes.name: Kiribath (Milk Rice)
recipes.description: Rice cooked in coconut milk, cut into diamond shapes
instructions: Cook rice in water until almost done
recipes.cultural_notes: Ceremonial dish served at New Year and auspicious occasions Kiribath is served on all auspicious occasions. Must be eaten with lunu miris (chili sambol) and kithul treacle. Cut in diamond shapes for good luck.
recipes.description_sinhala: පොල් කිරිවලින් පිසූ බත්, දියමන්ති හැඩයට කපා
recipes.description_tamil: தேங்காய் பாலில் சமைத்த அரிசி, வைர வடிவங்களில் வெட்டப்பட்டது
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: චාරිත්‍රානුකූලව අලුත් අවුරුද්දේ සහ නැකැත් අවස්ථාවන්හිදී පිරිනමනු ලැබේ
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: புத்தாண்டு மற்றும் மங்களகரமான சந்தர்ப்பங்களில் பரிமாறப்படும் சடங்கு உணவு

recipes.name: Isso Wade (Prawn Fritters)
recipes.description: Crispy lentil fritters with prawns
instructions: Mix in prawns, chilies, onion, curry leaves, fennel (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Popular tea-time snack, sold by street vendors
recipes.description_sinhala: ඉස්සන් සමග හැපෙනසුළු පරිප්පු බැදපු
recipes.description_tamil: இறாலுடன் மிருதுவான பருப்பு பொரியல்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: වීදි වෙළෙන්දන් විසින් අලෙවි කරන ජනප්‍රිය තේ-කාල කෙටි කෑම
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: பிரபலமான தேநீர் நேர சிற்றுண்டி, தெரு வியாபாரிகளால் விற்கப்படுகிறது

recipes.name: Gotukola Sambol
recipes.description: Gotu kola leaves salad with coconut
instructions: Wash and finely chop gotu kola leaves
Add sliced onions and green chilies
Add lime juice, chili powder, salt
recipes.cultural_notes: Considered very healthy, gotu kola is believed to boost memory Must be freshly made - sambol loses flavor if stored too long. Maldive fish (umbalakada) is essential and irreplaceable. Use coconut scraped fresh, not desiccated.
recipes.description_sinhala: ගොටුකොළ පොල් සමග සලාද කොළ
recipes.description_tamil: கோது கோலா இலை சாலட் தேங்காய்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ඉතා සෞඛ්‍ය සම්පන්න යැයි සැලකෙන ගොටුකොළ මතක ශක්තිය වැඩි කරන බව විශ්වාස කෙරේ
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: மிகவும் ஆரோக்கியமானதாக கருதப்படும் கோது கோலா நினைவாற்றலை அதிகரிக்கும் என்று நம்பப்படுகிறது

recipes.name: Pittu
recipes.description: Steamed cylinders of rice flour and coconut
instructions: Mix rice flour with water to get breadcrumb consistency
Layer rice flour and coconut in pittu maker
Serve with curry or banana and sugar
recipes.cultural_notes: Traditional breakfast, can be eaten sweet or savory
recipes.description_sinhala: සහල් පිටි සහ පොල් තැම්බූ සිලින්ඩර
recipes.description_tamil: அரிசி மாவு மற்றும் தேங்காய் வேகவைத்த சிலிண்டர்கள்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: සාම්ප්‍රදායික උදෑසන ආහාරය, පැණිරස හෝ රසවත් ලෙස අනුභව කළ හැකිය
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: பாரம்பரிய காலை உணவை இனிப்பு அல்லது காரமாக உண்ணலாம்

recipes.name: Pol Roti (Coconut Roti)
recipes.description: Whole wheat flatbread with coconut
instructions: Mix flour, coconut, onion, chilies, salt
Cook on hot griddle with oil
recipes.cultural_notes: Popular breakfast roti, often served with curry
recipes.description_sinhala: පොල් සමග සම්පූර්ණ තිරිඟු පැතලි පාන්
recipes.description_tamil: தேங்காயுடன் முழு கோதுமை பிளாட்பிரெட்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ජනප්‍රිය උදේ ආහාරය රොටි, බොහෝ විට ව්‍යංජන සමඟ සේවය කරයි
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: பிரபலமான காலை உணவு ரொட்டி, பெரும்பாலும் கறியுடன் பரிமாறப்படுகிறது

recipes.name: Parippu (Red Lentil Curry)
recipes.description: Simple red lentil curry, daily staple
instructions: Boil with water and turmeric until soft
For tempering: heat oil, add cumin
Add curry leaves, onions, chilies (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Eaten daily with rice, essential Sri Lankan dish
recipes.description_sinhala: සරල රතු පරිප්පු ව්‍යංජනය, දෛනික ප්‍රධාන ආහාරය
recipes.description_tamil: எளிய சிவப்பு பருப்பு கறி, தினசரி முக்கிய உணவு
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ශ්‍රී ලංකාවේ අත්‍යවශ්‍ය ආහාරයක් වන බත් සමඟ දිනපතා අනුභව කරනු ලැබේ
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: இலங்கையின் அத்தியாவசிய உணவான அரிசியுடன் தினமும் சாப்பிடலாம்

recipes.name: Devilled Chicken
recipes.description: Spicy stir-fried chicken with peppers
instructions: Marinate chicken with salt, pepper, garlic
Heat oil and fry chicken until golden
Add chili paste, ketchup, soy sauce, vinegar
recipes.cultural_notes: Burgher-style dish, very popular in restaurants
recipes.description_sinhala: ගම්මිරිස් සමග කුළුබඩු කලවම් කළ කුකුල් මස්
recipes.description_tamil: மிளகுத்தூள் கொண்ட காரமான வறுத்த கோழி
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: බර්ගර් විලාසිතාවේ කෑමක්, අවන්හල්වල ඉතා ජනප්‍රියයි
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: பர்கர் பாணி உணவு, உணவகங்களில் மிகவும் பிரபலமானது

recipes.name: Kokis
recipes.description: Crispy flower-shaped cookies for New Year
instructions: Gradually add rice flour and salt
Dip kokis mold in hot oil
Fry in hot oil until crispy
recipes.cultural_notes: Essential Sinhala and Tamil New Year sweet
recipes.description_sinhala: අලුත් අවුරුද්ද සඳහා හැපෙනසුළු මල් හැඩැති කුකීස්
recipes.description_tamil: புத்தாண்டுக்கான மிருதுவான மலர் வடிவ குக்கீகள்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: අත්‍යවශ්‍ය සිංහල සහ දෙමළ අලුත් අවුරුද්ද මිහිරි
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: இன்றியமையாத சிங்கள மற்றும் தமிழ் புத்தாண்டு இனிப்பு

recipes.name: Beetroot Curry
recipes.description: Vibrant beetroot curry with coconut
instructions: Add onion, curry leaves, chilies (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Popular vegetable curry, loved for its color
recipes.description_sinhala: පොල් සමග විචිත්‍රවත් බීට්රූට් කරිය
recipes.description_tamil: தேங்காயுடன் துடிப்பான பீட்ரூட் கறி
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ජනප්‍රිය එළවළු ව්‍යංජනය, එහි වර්ණයට ප්‍රිය කරයි
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: பிரபலமான காய்கறி கறி, அதன் நிறத்திற்காக விரும்பப்படுகிறது

recipes.name: Cashew Curry
recipes.description: Rich curry with cashew nuts
instructions: Add curry leaves and chilies (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Considered a luxury curry, often served at special meals
recipes.description_sinhala: කජු සමග පොහොසත් කරි
recipes.description_tamil: முந்திரி பருப்புடன் நிறைந்த கறி
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: සුඛෝපභෝගී ව්‍යංජනයක් ලෙස සලකනු ලැබේ, බොහෝ විට විශේෂ ආහාර වේලෙහි සේවය කරනු ලැබේ
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: ஆடம்பரமான கறியாகக் கருதப்படுகிறது, இது பெரும்பாலும் சிறப்பு உணவுகளில் பரிமாறப்படுகிறது

recipes.name: Lunu Miris
recipes.description: Simple onion and chili paste
recipes.cultural_notes: Essential accompaniment to kiribath at breakfast
recipes.description_sinhala: සරල ලූනු සහ මිරිස් පේස්ට්
recipes.description_tamil: எளிய வெங்காயம் மற்றும் மிளகாய் விழுது
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: උදෑසන ආහාර වේලෙහි කිරිබත් සඳහා අත්‍යවශ්‍ය සහායකය

recipes.name: Ambul Thiyal (Sour Fish Curry)
recipes.description: Dry fish curry with goraka, a Southern specialty
instructions: Marinate fish with curry powder, chili, pepper, salt
Add cinnamon and curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Cook on low heat until dry
recipes.cultural_notes: Traditional Southern dish that keeps for days without refrigeration Use fresh fish from coastal markets. Goraka (garcinia) is essential for authentic sour taste - never substitute with tamarind. The curry should have a deep red color from roasted spices.
recipes.description_sinhala: දකුණේ විශේෂ ආහාරයක් වන ගොරකා සමග කරවල කරපිංචා
recipes.description_tamil: கோரக்காவுடன் உலர் மீன் குழம்பு, தென்னக ஸ்பெஷல்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ශීතකරණ නොමැතිව දින ගණනක් තබා ගන්නා සම්ප්‍රදායික දක්ෂිණ ආහාරය
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: குளிர்சாதனப்பெட்டியில் இல்லாமல் நாட்கள் வைத்திருக்கும் பாரம்பரிய தெற்கு உணவு

recipes.name: Isso Curry (Prawn Curry)
recipes.description: Rich prawn curry with coconut milk
instructions: Heat oil, sauté onions, garlic, ginger
Add curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Coastal specialty, best with fresh prawns
recipes.description_sinhala: පොල් කිරි සමග පොහොසත් ඉස්සන් කරිය
recipes.description_tamil: தேங்காய் பாலுடன் நிறைந்த இறால் கறி
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: වෙරළබඩ විශේෂත්වය, නැවුම් ඉස්සන් සමඟ හොඳම

recipes.name: Brinjal Moju (Eggplant Pickle)
recipes.description: Sweet and sour eggplant pickle
instructions: In same oil, add mustard seeds
Add curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Essential accompaniment for rice and curry, stores well
recipes.description_sinhala: පැණිරස හා ඇඹුල් වම්බටු අච්චාරු
recipes.description_tamil: இனிப்பு மற்றும் புளிப்பு கத்திரிக்காய் ஊறுகாய்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: බත් සහ ව්‍යංජන සඳහා අත්‍යවශ්‍ය සහායකය, හොඳින් ගබඩා කරයි
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: சாதம் மற்றும் கறிக்கு அத்தியாவசியமான துணை, நன்றாக சேமித்து வைக்கிறது

recipes.name: Kiri Hodi (Coconut Milk Gravy)
recipes.description: Mild coconut milk curry, served with kiribath
instructions: Add onions, chilies, curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Add lime juice at the end
recipes.cultural_notes: Traditional accompaniment to kiribath at New Year
recipes.description_sinhala: මෘදු පොල් කිරි ව්‍යංජනය, කිරිබත් සමඟ පිළිගැන්වේ
recipes.description_tamil: லேசான தேங்காய் பால் கறி, கிரிபாத்துடன் பரிமாறப்பட்டது
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: අලුත් අවුරුද්දේ කිරිබත් සඳහා සම්ප්‍රදායික වාදනය

recipes.name: Cuttlefish Curry
recipes.description: Tender cuttlefish in spicy curry
instructions: Add curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Requires slow cooking to make cuttlefish tender Use fresh fish from coastal markets. Goraka (garcinia) is essential for authentic sour taste - never substitute with tamarind. The curry should have a deep red color from roasted spices.
recipes.description_sinhala: කුළුබඩු සහිත කරිවල ටෙන්ඩර් කට්ල්ෆිෂ්
recipes.description_tamil: காரமான கறியில் மென்மையான கட்ஃபிஷ்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: කට්ල්ෆිෂ් ටෙන්ඩර් කිරීම සඳහා මන්දගාමී ආහාර පිසීම අවශ්ය වේ

recipes.name: Batu Moju (Bean Pickle)
recipes.description: Sweet and sour green bean pickle
instructions: In same oil, add mustard seeds
Add curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Popular side dish that pairs well with rice
recipes.description_sinhala: පැණිරස හා ඇඹුල් කොළ බෝංචි අච්චාරු
recipes.description_tamil: இனிப்பு மற்றும் புளிப்பு பச்சை பீன் ஊறுகாய்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: සහල් සමඟ හොඳින් සම්බන්ධ වන ජනප්‍රිය අතුරු කෑමක්
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: அரிசியுடன் நன்றாக இணைக்கும் பிரபலமான சைட் டிஷ்

recipes.name: Achcharu (Mixed Pickle)
recipes.description: Mixed vegetable pickle with mustard
instructions: Cut all vegetables into thin strips
Mix vegetables with mustard, vinegar, sugar, chili
recipes.cultural_notes: Popular snack pickle, sold by street vendors
recipes.description_sinhala: අබ සමග මිශ්ර එළවළු අච්චාරු
recipes.description_tamil: கடுகு கலந்த காய்கறி ஊறுகாய்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: වීදි වෙළෙන්දන් විසින් අලෙවි කරන ජනප්‍රිය ස්නැක් අච්චාරු
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: பிரபலமான சிற்றுண்டி ஊறுகாய், தெரு வியாபாரிகளால் விற்கப்படுகிறது

recipes.name: Chicken Biryani Sri Lankan Style
recipes.description: Fragrant rice layered with spiced chicken
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, ginger-garlic, garam masala
Cover and cook on low heat (dum)
recipes.cultural_notes: Popular at Muslim weddings and celebrations
recipes.description_sinhala: කුළුබඩු සහිත කුකුල් මස් තට්ටුවක් සහිත සුවඳ සහල්
recipes.description_tamil: மசாலா கோழியுடன் அடுக்கப்பட்ட மணம் கொண்ட அரிசி
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: මුස්ලිම් විවාහ උත්සව සහ උත්සවවලදී ජනප්‍රියයි

recipes.name: Cutlets (Potato Croquettes)
recipes.description: Spiced potato croquettes, breaded and fried
instructions: Fry minced meat with onions, curry powder (Fry until aromatic and oil separates - this is key to authentic flavor)
recipes.cultural_notes: Favorite tea-time snack, Burgher specialty
recipes.description_sinhala: කුළුබඩු සහිත අර්තාපල් croquettes, පාන් සහ ෆ්රයිඩ්
recipes.description_tamil: மசாலா உருளைக்கிழங்கு croquettes, ரொட்டி மற்றும் வறுத்த
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ප්‍රියතම තේ-කාල ස්නැක්, බර්ගර් විශේෂත්වය
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: பிடித்தமான தேநீர் நேர சிற்றுண்டி, பர்கர் சிறப்பு

recipes.name: Patties (Curry Puffs)
recipes.description: Flaky pastry filled with spiced meat or fish
instructions: Make pastry with flour, butter, egg
Cook filling with meat, onions, curry powder
recipes.cultural_notes: Popular street food and party snack
recipes.description_sinhala: කුළුබඩු සහිත මස් හෝ මාළු පිරවූ පියලි පේස්ට්‍රි
recipes.description_tamil: மசாலா இறைச்சி அல்லது மீன் நிரப்பப்பட்ட மெல்லிய பேஸ்ட்ரி
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ජනප්‍රිය වීදි ආහාර සහ උත්සව සුලු කෑම
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: பிரபலமான தெரு உணவு மற்றும் விருந்து சிற்றுண்டி

recipes.name: Murukku (Crispy Snack)
recipes.description: Crispy spiral-shaped rice flour snack
recipes.cultural_notes: Traditional Tamil snack for festivals
recipes.description_sinhala: හැපෙනසුළු සර්පිලාකාර හැඩැති සහල් පිටි ස්නැක්
recipes.description_tamil: மிருதுவான சுழல் வடிவ அரிசி மாவு சிற்றுண்டி
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: උත්සව සඳහා සාම්ප්‍රදායික දෙමළ කෑම

recipes.name: Wade (Lentil Fritters)
recipes.description: Savory lentil donuts, crispy outside, soft inside
instructions: Add chilies, onions, curry leaves, fennel (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Shape into donuts with hole in center
recipes.cultural_notes: Classic tea-time snack, sold everywhere
recipes.description_sinhala: රසවත් පරිප්පු ඩෝනට්ස්, පිටත හැපෙනසුළු, ඇතුළත මෘදුයි
recipes.description_tamil: சுவையான பருப்பு டோனட்ஸ், வெளியில் மிருதுவானது, உள்ளே மென்மையானது
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: සම්භාව්‍ය තේ-කාල ස්නැක්, සෑම තැනකම විකුණනු ලැබේ
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: உன்னதமான தேநீர் நேர சிற்றுண்டி, எல்லா இடங்களிலும் விற்கப்படுகிறது

recipes.name: Kavum (Oil Cakes)
recipes.description: Deep-fried rice flour cakes with treacle
instructions: Add coconut milk to form thick batter
recipes.cultural_notes: Essential New Year sweet, made with kithul treacle
recipes.description_sinhala: ගැඹුරු තෙලේ බැදපු සහල් පිටි කේක්
recipes.description_tamil: ஆழத்தில் வறுத்த அரிசி மாவு கேக்குகள்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: අත්‍යවශ්‍ය අලුත් අවුරුදු රසකැවිලි, කිතුල් කරල් වලින් සාදා ඇත
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: அத்தியாவசிய புத்தாண்டு இனிப்பு, கித்துல் ட்ரீக்கிள் மூலம் செய்யப்படுகிறது

recipes.name: Aggala (Sweet Balls)
recipes.description: Sweet rice flour balls with coconut
recipes.cultural_notes: Healthy traditional sweet, no oil used
recipes.description_sinhala: පොල් සමග පැණිරස හාල් පිටි බෝල
recipes.description_tamil: தேங்காயுடன் இனிப்பு அரிசி மாவு உருண்டைகள்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: සෞඛ්ය සම්පන්න සාම්ප්රදායික පැණිරස, තෙල් භාවිතා නොවේ

recipes.name: Athirasa (Jaggery Pancakes)
recipes.description: Sweet rice flour pancakes fried in oil
instructions: Mix with rice flour to form dough
recipes.cultural_notes: Popular Tamil and Sinhala sweet for festivals
recipes.description_sinhala: පැණිරස හාල් පිටි පෑන්කේක් තෙල් බදින ලද
recipes.description_tamil: எண்ணெயில் பொரித்த இனிப்பு அரிசி மாவு அப்பத்தை
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: උත්සව සඳහා ජනප්‍රිය දෙමළ සහ සිංහල රසකැවිලි
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: பண்டிகைகளுக்கு பிரபலமான தமிழ் மற்றும் சிங்கள இனிப்பு

recipes.name: Kalu Dodol (Black Toffee)
recipes.description: Sticky black toffee made with kithul treacle
instructions: Mix rice flour with coconut milk
Cook on low heat, stirring constantly
Cook until it doesn't stick to pan
recipes.cultural_notes: Labor-intensive traditional sweet, requires constant stirring
recipes.description_sinhala: කිතුල් ට්‍රේකල් වලින් සාදන ලද ඇලෙන සුළු කළු ටොෆි
recipes.description_tamil: கித்துல் ட்ரீக்கிள் மூலம் செய்யப்பட்ட ஒட்டும் கருப்பு டோஃபி
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ශ්රම-දැඩි සාම්ප්රදායික පැණිරස, නිරන්තරයෙන් ඇවිස්සීම අවශ්ය වේ
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: உழைப்பு மிகுந்த பாரம்பரிய இனிப்பு, தொடர்ந்து கிளறி தேவைப்படுகிறது

recipes.name: Aasmi (Crispy Sweets)
recipes.description: Crispy fried swirls dipped in sugar syrup
instructions: Mix flours with egg and water
recipes.cultural_notes: Muslim Eid specialty, colorful and festive
recipes.description_sinhala: සීනි සිරප් වල ගිල්වන ලද හැපෙනසුළු ෆ්රයිඩ් කරකැවිල්ල
recipes.description_tamil: மிருதுவான வறுத்த சுழிகள் சர்க்கரை பாகில் தோய்த்து
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: මුස්ලිම් ඊද් විශේෂත්වය, වර්ණවත් සහ උත්සව
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: முஸ்லிம் ஈத் சிறப்பு, வண்ணமயமான மற்றும் பண்டிகை

recipes.name: Milk Toffee
recipes.description: Creamy milk fudge with cashews
instructions: Boil sugar and water to syrup
recipes.cultural_notes: Modern Sri Lankan favorite, popular gift item
recipes.description_sinhala: කජු සමග ක්‍රීමි කිරි ෆජ්
recipes.description_tamil: முந்திரியுடன் கிரீம் பால் ஃபட்ஜ்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: නූතන ශ්‍රී ලාංකික ප්‍රියතම, ජනප්‍රිය තෑගි භාණ්ඩය
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: நவீன இலங்கையின் விருப்பமான, பிரபலமான பரிசுப் பொருள்

recipes.name: Bombai Muttai (Candy Floss)
recipes.description: Crispy meringue balls, light and sweet
instructions: Add vinegar and cream of tartar
recipes.cultural_notes: Popular children's sweet, sold at fairs
recipes.description_sinhala: හැපෙනසුළු මෙරිංගු බෝල, සැහැල්ලු හා පැණිරස
recipes.description_tamil: மிருதுவான மெரிங்கு பந்துகள், ஒளி மற்றும் இனிப்பு
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ජනප්‍රිය ළමා රසකැවිලි, ප්‍රදර්ශනවල විකුණනු ලැබේ

recipes.name: Pani Pol (Coconut Toffee)
recipes.description: Sweet coconut jaggery toffee
recipes.cultural_notes: Simple traditional sweet, made at home
recipes.description_sinhala: පැණිරස පොල් හකුරු ටොෆි
recipes.description_tamil: இனிப்பு தேங்காய் வெல்லம் டோஃபி
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: සරල සාම්ප්‍රදායික රසකැවිලි, ගෙදර හැදූ

recipes.name: Ginger Beer
recipes.description: Homemade ginger drink, fizzy and spicy
instructions: Add sugar and stir to dissolve
recipes.cultural_notes: Traditional homemade soda, Christmas favorite
recipes.description_sinhala: ගෙදර හැදූ ඉඟුරු බීම, ෆීසි සහ කුළුබඩු
recipes.description_tamil: வீட்டில் தயாரிக்கப்பட்ட இஞ்சி பானம், ஃபிஸி மற்றும் காரமான
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: සාම්ප්රදායික ගෙදර හැදූ සෝඩා, නත්තල් ප්රියතම
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: பாரம்பரிய வீட்டில் தயாரிக்கப்பட்ட சோடா, கிறிஸ்துமஸ் பிடித்தது

recipes.name: Faluda
recipes.description: Rose-flavored milk drink with jelly and ice cream
instructions: Prepare agar jelly and cut into cubes
In tall glass, add rose syrup
Add basil seeds and jelly cubes
recipes.cultural_notes: Popular Ramadan drink, sold by Muslim vendors
recipes.description_sinhala: ජෙලි සහ අයිස්ක්‍රීම් සමඟ රෝස රසැති කිරි පානය
recipes.description_tamil: ஜெல்லி மற்றும் ஐஸ்கிரீமுடன் ரோஸ்-ஃப்ளேவர் பால் பானம்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ජනප්‍රිය රාමසාන් පානය, මුස්ලිම් වෙළෙන්දන් විසින් විකුණනු ලැබේ
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: பிரபலமான ரமலான் பானம், முஸ்லீம் விற்பனையாளர்களால் விற்கப்படுகிறது

recipes.name: Woodapple Juice
recipes.description: Refreshing juice from wood apple fruit
recipes.cultural_notes: Cooling drink for hot weather, very healthy
recipes.description_sinhala: ලී ඇපල් ගෙඩියෙන් යුෂ නැවුම් කරයි
recipes.description_tamil: மர ஆப்பிள் பழத்திலிருந்து புத்துணர்ச்சியூட்டும் சாறு
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: උණුසුම් කාලගුණය සඳහා සිසිල් බීම, ඉතා සෞඛ්ය සම්පන්න

recipes.name: King Coconut Water (Thambili)
recipes.description: Fresh king coconut water, nature's electrolyte drink
instructions: Optional: scrape soft flesh and eat
recipes.cultural_notes: National drink of Sri Lanka, sold by roadside vendors
recipes.description_sinhala: නැවුම් රජ පොල් වතුර, සොබාදහමේ ඉලෙක්ට්‍රොලයිට් පානය
recipes.description_tamil: புதிய ராஜா தேங்காய் தண்ணீர், இயற்கையின் எலக்ட்ரோலைட் பானம்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ශ්‍රී ලංකාවේ ජාතික පානය, පාර අයිනේ වෙළෙන්දන් විසින් විකුණනු ලැබේ
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: இலங்கையின் தேசிய பானம், சாலையோர வியாபாரிகளால் விற்கப்படுகிறது

recipes.name: Curd with Treacle
recipes.description: Buffalo curd served with palm treacle
recipes.cultural_notes: Traditional dessert, curd in clay pots is special
recipes.description_sinhala: මී හරක් හොද්ද තල් ට්‍රේකල් සමඟ සේවය කරයි
recipes.description_tamil: பனை வெல்லத்துடன் பரிமாறப்படும் எருமை தயிர்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: සාම්ප්‍රදායික අතුරුපස, මැටි මුට්ටිවල කිරිබත් විශේෂයි
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: பாரம்பரிய இனிப்பு, மண் பானைகளில் தயிர் சிறப்பு

recipes.name: Mung Kavum
recipes.description: Mung bean oil cakes
instructions: Mix mung flour and rice flour
recipes.cultural_notes: Variation of kavum, lighter texture
recipes.description_sinhala: මුං බෝංචි තෙල් කේක්
recipes.description_tamil: வெண்டைக்காய் எண்ணெய் கேக்குகள்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: කැවුම් වෙනස් වීම, සැහැල්ලු වයනය

recipes.name: Bibikkan (Coconut Cake)
recipes.description: Rich coconut and jaggery cake with cashews
recipes.cultural_notes: Traditional Christmas and New Year cake
recipes.description_sinhala: කජු සමග පොහොසත් පොල් සහ හකුරු කේක්
recipes.description_tamil: முந்திரியுடன் நிறைந்த தேங்காய் மற்றும் வெல்லம் கேக்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: සාම්ප්රදායික නත්තල් සහ අලුත් අවුරුදු කේක්

recipes.name: Ambul Thiyal (Sour Fish Curry)
recipes.description: Dry fish curry with goraka, a Southern specialty
instructions: Marinate fish with curry powder, chili, pepper, salt
Add cinnamon and curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Cook on low heat until dry
recipes.cultural_notes: Traditional Southern dish that keeps for days without refrigeration Use fresh fish from coastal markets. Goraka (garcinia) is essential for authentic sour taste - never substitute with tamarind. The curry should have a deep red color from roasted spices.
recipes.description_sinhala: දකුණේ විශේෂ ආහාරයක් වන ගොරකා සමග කරවල කරපිංචා
recipes.description_tamil: கோரக்காவுடன் உலர் மீன் குழம்பு, தென்னக ஸ்பெஷல்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ශීතකරණ නොමැතිව දින ගණනක් තබා ගන්නා සම්ප්‍රදායික දක්ෂිණ ආහාරය
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: குளிர்சாதனப்பெட்டியில் இல்லாமல் நாட்கள் வைத்திருக்கும் பாரம்பரிய தெற்கு உணவு

recipes.name: Isso Curry (Prawn Curry)
recipes.description: Rich prawn curry with coconut milk
instructions: Heat oil, sauté onions, garlic, ginger
Add curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Coastal specialty, best with fresh prawns
recipes.description_sinhala: පොල් කිරි සමග පොහොසත් ඉස්සන් කරිය
recipes.description_tamil: தேங்காய் பாலுடன் நிறைந்த இறால் கறி
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: වෙරළබඩ විශේෂත්වය, නැවුම් ඉස්සන් සමඟ හොඳම

recipes.name: Brinjal Moju (Eggplant Pickle)
recipes.description: Sweet and sour eggplant pickle
instructions: In same oil, add mustard seeds
Add curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Essential accompaniment for rice and curry, stores well
recipes.description_sinhala: පැණිරස හා ඇඹුල් වම්බටු අච්චාරු
recipes.description_tamil: இனிப்பு மற்றும் புளிப்பு கத்திரிக்காய் ஊறுகாய்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: බත් සහ ව්‍යංජන සඳහා අත්‍යවශ්‍ය සහායකය, හොඳින් ගබඩා කරයි
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: சாதம் மற்றும் கறிக்கு அத்தியாவசியமான துணை, நன்றாக சேமித்து வைக்கிறது

recipes.name: Kiri Hodi (Coconut Milk Gravy)
recipes.description: Mild coconut milk curry, served with kiribath
instructions: Add onions, chilies, curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Add lime juice at the end
recipes.cultural_notes: Traditional accompaniment to kiribath at New Year
recipes.description_sinhala: මෘදු පොල් කිරි ව්‍යංජනය, කිරිබත් සමඟ පිළිගැන්වේ
recipes.description_tamil: லேசான தேங்காய் பால் கறி, கிரிபாத்துடன் பரிமாறப்பட்டது
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: අලුත් අවුරුද්දේ කිරිබත් සඳහා සම්ප්‍රදායික වාදනය

recipes.name: Cuttlefish Curry
recipes.description: Tender cuttlefish in spicy curry
instructions: Add curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Requires slow cooking to make cuttlefish tender Use fresh fish from coastal markets. Goraka (garcinia) is essential for authentic sour taste - never substitute with tamarind. The curry should have a deep red color from roasted spices.
recipes.description_sinhala: කුළුබඩු සහිත කරිවල ටෙන්ඩර් කට්ල්ෆිෂ්
recipes.description_tamil: காரமான கறியில் மென்மையான கட்ஃபிஷ்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: කට්ල්ෆිෂ් ටෙන්ඩර් කිරීම සඳහා මන්දගාමී ආහාර පිසීම අවශ්ය වේ

recipes.name: Batu Moju (Bean Pickle)
recipes.description: Sweet and sour green bean pickle
instructions: In same oil, add mustard seeds
Add curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Popular side dish that pairs well with rice
recipes.description_sinhala: පැණිරස හා ඇඹුල් කොළ බෝංචි අච්චාරු
recipes.description_tamil: இனிப்பு மற்றும் புளிப்பு பச்சை பீன் ஊறுகாய்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: සහල් සමඟ හොඳින් සම්බන්ධ වන ජනප්‍රිය අතුරු කෑමක්
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: அரிசியுடன் நன்றாக இணைக்கும் பிரபலமான சைட் டிஷ்

recipes.name: Achcharu (Mixed Pickle)
recipes.description: Mixed vegetable pickle with mustard
instructions: Cut all vegetables into thin strips
Mix vegetables with mustard, vinegar, sugar, chili
recipes.cultural_notes: Popular snack pickle, sold by street vendors
recipes.description_sinhala: අබ සමග මිශ්ර එළවළු අච්චාරු
recipes.description_tamil: கடுகு கலந்த காய்கறி ஊறுகாய்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: වීදි වෙළෙන්දන් විසින් අලෙවි කරන ජනප්‍රිය ස්නැක් අච්චාරු
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: பிரபலமான சிற்றுண்டி ஊறுகாய், தெரு வியாபாரிகளால் விற்கப்படுகிறது

recipes.name: Chicken Biryani Sri Lankan Style
recipes.description: Fragrant rice layered with spiced chicken
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, ginger-garlic, garam masala
Cover and cook on low heat (dum)
recipes.cultural_notes: Popular at Muslim weddings and celebrations
recipes.description_sinhala: කුළුබඩු සහිත කුකුල් මස් තට්ටුවක් සහිත සුවඳ සහල්
recipes.description_tamil: மசாலா கோழியுடன் அடுக்கப்பட்ட மணம் கொண்ட அரிசி
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: මුස්ලිම් විවාහ උත්සව සහ උත්සවවලදී ජනප්‍රියයි

recipes.name: Cutlets (Potato Croquettes)
recipes.description: Spiced potato croquettes, breaded and fried
instructions: Fry minced meat with onions, curry powder (Fry until aromatic and oil separates - this is key to authentic flavor)
recipes.cultural_notes: Favorite tea-time snack, Burgher specialty
recipes.description_sinhala: කුළුබඩු සහිත අර්තාපල් croquettes, පාන් සහ ෆ්රයිඩ්
recipes.description_tamil: மசாலா உருளைக்கிழங்கு croquettes, ரொட்டி மற்றும் வறுத்த
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ප්‍රියතම තේ-කාල ස්නැක්, බර්ගර් විශේෂත්වය
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: பிடித்தமான தேநீர் நேர சிற்றுண்டி, பர்கர் சிறப்பு

recipes.name: Patties (Curry Puffs)
recipes.description: Flaky pastry filled with spiced meat or fish
instructions: Make pastry with flour, butter, egg
Cook filling with meat, onions, curry powder
recipes.cultural_notes: Popular street food and party snack
recipes.description_sinhala: කුළුබඩු සහිත මස් හෝ මාළු පිරවූ පියලි පේස්ට්‍රි
recipes.description_tamil: மசாலா இறைச்சி அல்லது மீன் நிரப்பப்பட்ட மெல்லிய பேஸ்ட்ரி
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ජනප්‍රිය වීදි ආහාර සහ උත්සව සුලු කෑම
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: பிரபலமான தெரு உணவு மற்றும் விருந்து சிற்றுண்டி

recipes.name: Murukku (Crispy Snack)
recipes.description: Crispy spiral-shaped rice flour snack
recipes.cultural_notes: Traditional Tamil snack for festivals
recipes.description_sinhala: හැපෙනසුළු සර්පිලාකාර හැඩැති සහල් පිටි ස්නැක්
recipes.description_tamil: மிருதுவான சுழல் வடிவ அரிசி மாவு சிற்றுண்டி
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: උත්සව සඳහා සාම්ප්‍රදායික දෙමළ කෑම

recipes.name: Wade (Lentil Fritters)
recipes.description: Savory lentil donuts, crispy outside, soft inside
instructions: Add chilies, onions, curry leaves, fennel (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Shape into donuts with hole in center
recipes.cultural_notes: Classic tea-time snack, sold everywhere
recipes.description_sinhala: රසවත් පරිප්පු ඩෝනට්ස්, පිටත හැපෙනසුළු, ඇතුළත මෘදුයි
recipes.description_tamil: சுவையான பருப்பு டோனட்ஸ், வெளியில் மிருதுவானது, உள்ளே மென்மையானது
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: සම්භාව්‍ය තේ-කාල ස්නැක්, සෑම තැනකම විකුණනු ලැබේ
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: உன்னதமான தேநீர் நேர சிற்றுண்டி, எல்லா இடங்களிலும் விற்கப்படுகிறது

recipes.name: Kavum (Oil Cakes)
recipes.description: Deep-fried rice flour cakes with treacle
instructions: Add coconut milk to form thick batter
recipes.cultural_notes: Essential New Year sweet, made with kithul treacle
recipes.description_sinhala: ගැඹුරු තෙලේ බැදපු සහල් පිටි කේක්
recipes.description_tamil: ஆழத்தில் வறுத்த அரிசி மாவு கேக்குகள்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: අත්‍යවශ්‍ය අලුත් අවුරුදු රසකැවිලි, කිතුල් කරල් වලින් සාදා ඇත
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: அத்தியாவசிய புத்தாண்டு இனிப்பு, கித்துல் ட்ரீக்கிள் மூலம் செய்யப்படுகிறது

recipes.name: Aggala (Sweet Balls)
recipes.description: Sweet rice flour balls with coconut
recipes.cultural_notes: Healthy traditional sweet, no oil used
recipes.description_sinhala: පොල් සමග පැණිරස හාල් පිටි බෝල
recipes.description_tamil: தேங்காயுடன் இனிப்பு அரிசி மாவு உருண்டைகள்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: සෞඛ්ය සම්පන්න සාම්ප්රදායික පැණිරස, තෙල් භාවිතා නොවේ

recipes.name: Athirasa (Jaggery Pancakes)
recipes.description: Sweet rice flour pancakes fried in oil
instructions: Mix with rice flour to form dough
recipes.cultural_notes: Popular Tamil and Sinhala sweet for festivals
recipes.description_sinhala: පැණිරස හාල් පිටි පෑන්කේක් තෙල් බදින ලද
recipes.description_tamil: எண்ணெயில் பொரித்த இனிப்பு அரிசி மாவு அப்பத்தை
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: උත්සව සඳහා ජනප්‍රිය දෙමළ සහ සිංහල රසකැවිලි
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: பண்டிகைகளுக்கு பிரபலமான தமிழ் மற்றும் சிங்கள இனிப்பு

recipes.name: Kalu Dodol (Black Toffee)
recipes.description: Sticky black toffee made with kithul treacle
instructions: Mix rice flour with coconut milk
Cook on low heat, stirring constantly
Cook until it doesn't stick to pan
recipes.cultural_notes: Labor-intensive traditional sweet, requires constant stirring
recipes.description_sinhala: කිතුල් ට්‍රේකල් වලින් සාදන ලද ඇලෙන සුළු කළු ටොෆි
recipes.description_tamil: கித்துல் ட்ரீக்கிள் மூலம் செய்யப்பட்ட ஒட்டும் கருப்பு டோஃபி
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ශ්රම-දැඩි සාම්ප්රදායික පැණිරස, නිරන්තරයෙන් ඇවිස්සීම අවශ්ය වේ
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: உழைப்பு மிகுந்த பாரம்பரிய இனிப்பு, தொடர்ந்து கிளறி தேவைப்படுகிறது

recipes.name: Aasmi (Crispy Sweets)
recipes.description: Crispy fried swirls dipped in sugar syrup
instructions: Mix flours with egg and water
recipes.cultural_notes: Muslim Eid specialty, colorful and festive
recipes.description_sinhala: සීනි සිරප් වල ගිල්වන ලද හැපෙනසුළු ෆ්රයිඩ් කරකැවිල්ල
recipes.description_tamil: மிருதுவான வறுத்த சுழிகள் சர்க்கரை பாகில் தோய்த்து
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: මුස්ලිම් ඊද් විශේෂත්වය, වර්ණවත් සහ උත්සව
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: முஸ்லிம் ஈத் சிறப்பு, வண்ணமயமான மற்றும் பண்டிகை

recipes.name: Milk Toffee
recipes.description: Creamy milk fudge with cashews
instructions: Boil sugar and water to syrup
recipes.cultural_notes: Modern Sri Lankan favorite, popular gift item
recipes.description_sinhala: කජු සමග ක්‍රීමි කිරි ෆජ්
recipes.description_tamil: முந்திரியுடன் கிரீம் பால் ஃபட்ஜ்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: නූතන ශ්‍රී ලාංකික ප්‍රියතම, ජනප්‍රිය තෑගි භාණ්ඩය
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: நவீன இலங்கையின் விருப்பமான, பிரபலமான பரிசுப் பொருள்

recipes.name: Bombai Muttai (Candy Floss)
recipes.description: Crispy meringue balls, light and sweet
instructions: Add vinegar and cream of tartar
recipes.cultural_notes: Popular children's sweet, sold at fairs
recipes.description_sinhala: හැපෙනසුළු මෙරිංගු බෝල, සැහැල්ලු හා පැණිරස
recipes.description_tamil: மிருதுவான மெரிங்கு பந்துகள், ஒளி மற்றும் இனிப்பு
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ජනප්‍රිය ළමා රසකැවිලි, ප්‍රදර්ශනවල විකුණනු ලැබේ

recipes.name: Pani Pol (Coconut Toffee)
recipes.description: Sweet coconut jaggery toffee
recipes.cultural_notes: Simple traditional sweet, made at home
recipes.description_sinhala: පැණිරස පොල් හකුරු ටොෆි
recipes.description_tamil: இனிப்பு தேங்காய் வெல்லம் டோஃபி
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: සරල සාම්ප්‍රදායික රසකැවිලි, ගෙදර හැදූ

recipes.name: Ginger Beer
recipes.description: Homemade ginger drink, fizzy and spicy
instructions: Add sugar and stir to dissolve
recipes.cultural_notes: Traditional homemade soda, Christmas favorite
recipes.description_sinhala: ගෙදර හැදූ ඉඟුරු බීම, ෆීසි සහ කුළුබඩු
recipes.description_tamil: வீட்டில் தயாரிக்கப்பட்ட இஞ்சி பானம், ஃபிஸி மற்றும் காரமான
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: සාම්ප්රදායික ගෙදර හැදූ සෝඩා, නත්තල් ප්රියතම
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: பாரம்பரிய வீட்டில் தயாரிக்கப்பட்ட சோடா, கிறிஸ்துமஸ் பிடித்தது

recipes.name: Faluda
recipes.description: Rose-flavored milk drink with jelly and ice cream
instructions: Prepare agar jelly and cut into cubes
In tall glass, add rose syrup
Add basil seeds and jelly cubes
recipes.cultural_notes: Popular Ramadan drink, sold by Muslim vendors
recipes.description_sinhala: ජෙලි සහ අයිස්ක්‍රීම් සමඟ රෝස රසැති කිරි පානය
recipes.description_tamil: ஜெல்லி மற்றும் ஐஸ்கிரீமுடன் ரோஸ்-ஃப்ளேவர் பால் பானம்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ජනප්‍රිය රාමසාන් පානය, මුස්ලිම් වෙළෙන්දන් විසින් විකුණනු ලැබේ
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: பிரபலமான ரமலான் பானம், முஸ்லீம் விற்பனையாளர்களால் விற்கப்படுகிறது

recipes.name: Woodapple Juice
recipes.description: Refreshing juice from wood apple fruit
recipes.cultural_notes: Cooling drink for hot weather, very healthy
recipes.description_sinhala: ලී ඇපල් ගෙඩියෙන් යුෂ නැවුම් කරයි
recipes.description_tamil: மர ஆப்பிள் பழத்திலிருந்து புத்துணர்ச்சியூட்டும் சாறு
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: උණුසුම් කාලගුණය සඳහා සිසිල් බීම, ඉතා සෞඛ්ය සම්පන්න

recipes.name: King Coconut Water (Thambili)
recipes.description: Fresh king coconut water, nature's electrolyte drink
instructions: Optional: scrape soft flesh and eat
recipes.cultural_notes: National drink of Sri Lanka, sold by roadside vendors
recipes.description_sinhala: නැවුම් රජ පොල් වතුර, සොබාදහමේ ඉලෙක්ට්‍රොලයිට් පානය
recipes.description_tamil: புதிய ராஜா தேங்காய் தண்ணீர், இயற்கையின் எலக்ட்ரோலைட் பானம்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ශ්‍රී ලංකාවේ ජාතික පානය, පාර අයිනේ වෙළෙන්දන් විසින් විකුණනු ලැබේ
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: இலங்கையின் தேசிய பானம், சாலையோர வியாபாரிகளால் விற்கப்படுகிறது

recipes.name: Curd with Treacle
recipes.description: Buffalo curd served with palm treacle
recipes.cultural_notes: Traditional dessert, curd in clay pots is special
recipes.description_sinhala: මී හරක් හොද්ද තල් ට්‍රේකල් සමඟ සේවය කරයි
recipes.description_tamil: பனை வெல்லத்துடன் பரிமாறப்படும் எருமை தயிர்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: සාම්ප්‍රදායික අතුරුපස, මැටි මුට්ටිවල කිරිබත් විශේෂයි
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: பாரம்பரிய இனிப்பு, மண் பானைகளில் தயிர் சிறப்பு

recipes.name: Mung Kavum
recipes.description: Mung bean oil cakes
instructions: Mix mung flour and rice flour
recipes.cultural_notes: Variation of kavum, lighter texture
recipes.description_sinhala: මුං බෝංචි තෙල් කේක්
recipes.description_tamil: வெண்டைக்காய் எண்ணெய் கேக்குகள்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: කැවුම් වෙනස් වීම, සැහැල්ලු වයනය

recipes.name: Bibikkan (Coconut Cake)
recipes.description: Rich coconut and jaggery cake with cashews
recipes.cultural_notes: Traditional Christmas and New Year cake
recipes.description_sinhala: කජු සමග පොහොසත් පොල් සහ හකුරු කේක්
recipes.description_tamil: முந்திரியுடன் நிறைந்த தேங்காய் மற்றும் வெல்லம் கேக்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: සාම්ප්රදායික නත්තල් සහ අලුත් අවුරුදු කේක්

recipes.name: Jaffna Crab Curry
recipes.description: Spicy crab curry with roasted spices, Jaffna signature dish
instructions: Clean crabs and cut into pieces
Heat oil and fry onions, garlic, ginger
Add roasted curry powder and fennel
Add tomatoes and cook until soft
Add crab pieces and mix well
Add thin coconut milk and simmer
Add curry leaves and chilies (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Jaffna's most famous dish, served at special occasions
recipes.description_sinhala: බැදපු කුළුබඩු සහිත කුළුබඩු සහිත කකුළුවන් ව්‍යංජනය, යාපනය අත්සන සහිත කෑමක්
recipes.description_tamil: வறுத்த மசாலாவுடன் காரமான நண்டு கறி, யாழ்ப்பாணம் கையெழுத்து உணவு
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: යාපනයේ ප්‍රසිද්ධම කෑමක්, විශේෂ අවස්ථා වලදී පිළිගැන්වේ
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: யாழ்ப்பாணத்தின் மிகவும் பிரபலமான உணவு, சிறப்பு சந்தர்ப்பங்களில் பரிமாறப்படுகிறது

recipes.name: Jaffna Mutton Curry
recipes.description: Rich mutton curry with roasted spices
instructions: Pressure cook mutton with salt until tender
Garnish with curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Traditional Jaffna Tamil wedding dish
recipes.description_sinhala: බැදපු කුළුබඩු සහිත පොහොසත් එළුමස් කරිය
recipes.description_tamil: வறுத்த மசாலா கொண்ட செறிவான மட்டன் கறி
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: යාපනයේ සම්ප්‍රදායික දෙමළ මංගල ආහාරය

recipes.name: Crab Kool (Crab Soup)
recipes.description: Thick crab soup with palmyrah flour
instructions: Sauté onions, garlic, ginger in oil
Add water and bring to boil
recipes.cultural_notes: Ancient Jaffna recipe using palmyrah flour
recipes.description_sinhala: තල් පිටි සමග ඝන කකුළුවන් සුප්
recipes.description_tamil: பனைவெல்லம் கொண்ட கெட்டியான நண்டு சூப்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: තල් පිටි භාවිතා කරන පුරාණ යාපනය වට්ටෝරුව
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: பனை மாவு பயன்படுத்தி பழங்கால யாழ்ப்பாண செய்முறை

recipes.name: Jaffna Dosai
recipes.description: Crispy fermented rice and lentil crepes
instructions: Soak rice, dal, and fenugreek overnight
Drain and grind to smooth batter
Add salt and ferment for 8-12 hours
recipes.cultural_notes: Daily breakfast staple in Jaffna homes
recipes.description_sinhala: ක්‍රිස්පි පැසුණු බත් සහ පරිප්පු ක්‍රේප්
recipes.description_tamil: மிருதுவான புளித்த அரிசி மற்றும் பருப்பு க்ரீப்ஸ்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: යාපනයේ නිවෙස්වල දෛනික උදෑසන ආහාරය

recipes.name: Kool (Seafood Soup)
recipes.description: Hearty seafood soup with mixed seafood
instructions: Boil water with onions, garlic, ginger
recipes.cultural_notes: Traditional Jaffna comfort food
recipes.description_sinhala: මිශ්ර මුහුදු ආහාර සමඟ හෘදයාංගම මුහුදු ආහාර සුප්
recipes.description_tamil: கலந்த கடல் உணவுகளுடன் இதயம் நிறைந்த கடல் உணவு சூப்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: යාපනයේ සාම්ප්‍රදායික සුවපහසු ආහාර

recipes.name: Odiyal Kool
recipes.description: Vegetarian version of kool with odiyal root
recipes.cultural_notes: Healthy Jaffna soup made during fasting
recipes.description_sinhala: ඔඩියල් මූල සහිත කූල් වල නිර්මාංශ අනුවාදය
recipes.description_tamil: ஒடியல் வேர் கொண்ட கூலின் சைவ பதிப்பு
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: උපවාසයේදී සාදන සෞඛ්‍ය සම්පන්න යාපනය සුප්
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: நோன்பின் போது செய்யப்படும் ஆரோக்கியமான யாழ்ப்பாண சூப்

recipes.name: Puttu (Steamed Rice Cake)
recipes.description: Cylindrical steamed rice cake with coconut
instructions: Mix rice flour with water to breadcrumb consistency
Layer flour and coconut in puttu maker
Traditionally served with banana and jaggery
recipes.cultural_notes: Breakfast staple, eaten sweet or with curry
recipes.description_sinhala: පොල් සමග සිලින්ඩරාකාර තැම්බූ සහල් කේක්
recipes.description_tamil: தேங்காய் சேர்த்து உருளை வடிவ அரிசி கேக்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: උදේ ආහාරය ප්‍රධාන ආහාරය, පැණිරස හෝ ව්‍යංජන සමඟ අනුභව කරනු ලැබේ
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: காலை உணவு பிரதானமானது, இனிப்பு அல்லது கறியுடன் உண்ணப்படுகிறது

recipes.name: Ulundu Vadai (Lentil Donuts)
recipes.description: Crispy urad dal fritters with onions
instructions: Add onions and curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Popular tea-time snack in Jaffna
recipes.description_sinhala: ලූනු සමඟ හැපෙනසුළු උරාඩ් පරිප්පු බැදපු
recipes.description_tamil: வெங்காயத்துடன் மிருதுவான உளுத்தம் பருப்பு பொரியல்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: යාපනයේ ජනප්‍රිය තේ-කාල කෙටි කෑමක්

recipes.name: Thengai Sadam (Coconut Rice)
recipes.description: Fragrant coconut rice with cashews
instructions: Add mustard seeds and urad dal
Add curry leaves and chilies (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Traditional temple offering and festival food
recipes.description_sinhala: කජු සමග සුවඳ පොල් බත්
recipes.description_tamil: முந்திரியுடன் கூடிய வாசனை தேங்காய் சாதம்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: සාම්ප්‍රදායික පන්සල් පූජාව සහ උත්සව ආහාර
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: பாரம்பரிய கோவில் பிரசாதம் மற்றும் திருவிழா உணவு

recipes.name: Masala Vadai
recipes.description: Spiced chana dal fritters
instructions: Drain and grind coarsely with chilies
Add onions and curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Popular street food in Jaffna town
recipes.description_sinhala: කුළුබඩු සහිත චනා පරිප්පු බැදපු
recipes.description_tamil: மசாலா சனா பருப்பு பொரியல்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: යාපනය නගරයේ ජනප්‍රිය වීදි ආහාර

recipes.name: Kuzhi Paniyaram
recipes.description: Small round fermented rice balls
instructions: Heat paniyaram pan with oil in each cavity
Cook until golden on both sides
recipes.cultural_notes: Made in special paniyaram pan with round cavities
recipes.description_sinhala: කුඩා රවුම් පැසුණු සහල් බෝල
recipes.description_tamil: சிறிய உருண்டையான புளித்த அரிசி உருண்டைகள்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: රවුම් කුහර සහිත විශේෂ පනියාරම් පෑන් තුළ සාදා ඇත
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: உருண்டையான துவாரங்களுடன் கூடிய சிறப்பு பணியாரம் சட்டியில் செய்யப்பட்டது

recipes.name: Prawn Varuval (Dry Prawn Fry)
recipes.description: Spicy dry fried prawns
instructions: Marinate prawns with curry powder, chili, turmeric, salt
Heat oil and add fennel seeds
Fry on high heat until dry
Add curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Popular side dish with rice
recipes.description_sinhala: කුළුබඩු සහිත වියළි බැදපු ඉස්සන්
recipes.description_tamil: காரமான உலர்ந்த வறுத்த இறால்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: සහල් සමඟ ජනප්‍රිය අතුරු කෑමක්

recipes.name: Rasam (Tamarind Soup)
recipes.description: Tangy tamarind soup with spices
instructions: In separate pan, temper mustard and cumin
Add curry leaves and garlic (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Digestive soup served with every meal
recipes.description_sinhala: කුළුබඩු සහිත ටැම්රිඩ් සුප්
recipes.description_tamil: மசாலாப் பொருட்களுடன் சுவையான புளி சூப்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ආහාර දිරවීමේ සුප් සෑම ආහාර වේලක් සමඟම සේවය කරයි

recipes.name: Thayir Sadam (Curd Rice)
recipes.description: Cooling yogurt rice with tempering
instructions: Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add chilies, ginger, curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Cooling meal for hot weather, aids digestion
recipes.description_sinhala: යෝගට් බත් තෙම්පරාදු කර සිසිල් කිරීම
recipes.description_tamil: தயிர் சாதம் குளிர்ச்சியுடன்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: උණුසුම් කාලගුණය සඳහා සිසිල් ආහාර, ආහාර දිරවීමට උපකාරී වේ
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: Cooling meal for hot weather, aids digestion

recipes.name: Aviyal (Mixed Vegetable Curry)
recipes.description: Mild vegetable curry with coconut and yogurt
ingredients: 1 tbsp coconut oil (traditional - do not substitute)
instructions: Boil vegetables with turmeric and salt until tender
Grind coconut, cumin, chilies to paste
Add curry leaves and coconut oil (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Traditional feast dish, very nutritious
recipes.description_sinhala: පොල් සහ යෝගට් සමග මෘදු එළවළු කරිය
recipes.description_tamil: தேங்காய் மற்றும் தயிர் கொண்ட லேசான காய்கறி கறி
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: සාම්ප්‍රදායික උත්සව කෑමක්, ඉතා පෝෂ්‍යදායී

recipes.name: Paruppu Urundai Kulambu (Lentil Ball Curry)
recipes.description: Lentil balls in tamarind gravy
instructions: Soak and grind dal with chilies and fennel
Make tamarind gravy with tomatoes, sambar powder
Temper with mustard and curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Special Sunday curry in Jaffna homes
recipes.description_sinhala: සියඹලා හොදි වල පරිප්පු බෝල
recipes.description_tamil: புளி குழம்பில் பருப்பு உருண்டைகள்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: යාපනයේ නිවෙස්වල විශේෂ ඉරිදා ව්‍යංජනය

recipes.name: Sambar (Lentil Vegetable Stew)
recipes.description: Tangy lentil stew with vegetables
instructions: Temper mustard, curry leaves in oil (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Essential accompaniment to rice, dosai, idli
recipes.description_sinhala: එළවළු සමග ටැන්ජි පරිප්පු ඉස්ටුවක්
recipes.description_tamil: காய்கறிகளுடன் கசப்பான பருப்பு குண்டு
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: බත්, දෝසායි, ඉඩ්ලි සඳහා අත්‍යවශ්‍ය සහායකය

recipes.name: Kootu (Vegetable with Lentils)
recipes.description: Mild vegetable and lentil curry
ingredients: 1 tbsp coconut oil (traditional - do not substitute)
instructions: Cook dal and vegetables separately until tender
Grind coconut, cumin, chilies to paste
Mix dal, vegetables, and coconut paste
Add curry leaves and coconut oil (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Comfort food, easy to digest
recipes.description_sinhala: මෘදු එළවළු සහ පරිප්පු කරිය
recipes.description_tamil: மிதமான காய்கறி மற்றும் பருப்பு கறி
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: පහසු ආහාර, දිරවීමට පහසුය

recipes.name: Elumichai Sadam (Lemon Rice)
recipes.description: Tangy lemon-flavored rice
instructions: Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add curry leaves and chilies (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Popular travel food, stays fresh
recipes.description_sinhala: ටැන්ජි ලෙමන් රසැති සහල්
recipes.description_tamil: கசப்பான எலுமிச்சை சுவை கொண்ட அரிசி
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ජනප්‍රිය සංචාරක ආහාර, නැවුම්ව පවතී

recipes.name: Milagai Bajji (Chili Fritters)
recipes.description: Batter-fried green chilies
instructions: Mix flours, chili powder, asafoetida, salt
Add water to make thick batter
Add baking soda just before frying
recipes.cultural_notes: Rainy day favorite snack
recipes.description_sinhala: බැටරයෙන් බැදගත් අමු මිරිස්
recipes.description_tamil: வறுத்த பச்சை மிளகாய்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: වැසි දින ප්රියතම කෙටි කෑමක්

recipes.name: Tomato Thokku (Tomato Chutney)
recipes.description: Spicy tomato preserve
instructions: Heat oil and add mustard, fenugreek
Add curry leaves and jaggery (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Long-lasting condiment, stored in clay pots
recipes.description_sinhala: කුළුබඩු සහිත තක්කාලි සංරක්ෂණය
recipes.description_tamil: காரமான தக்காளி பாதுகாப்பு
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: දිගු කල් පවතින කුළුබඩු, මැටි භාජන වල ගබඩා කර ඇත
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: களிமண் பானைகளில் சேமித்து வைக்கப்படும் நீண்ட கால மசாலா

recipes.name: Idli (Steamed Rice Cakes)
recipes.description: Soft steamed fermented rice cakes
instructions: Soak rice, dal, fenugreek separately for 6 hours
Grind rice to slightly coarse batter
Serve hot with sambar and chutney
recipes.cultural_notes: Healthy breakfast, easy to digest
recipes.description_sinhala: මෘදු තැම්බූ පැසුණු සහල් කේක්
recipes.description_tamil: மென்மையான வேகவைத்த புளித்த அரிசி கேக்குகள்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: සෞඛ්‍ය සම්පන්න උදෑසන ආහාරය, දිරවීමට පහසුය

recipes.name: Pongal (Savory Rice)
recipes.description: Creamy rice and lentil dish
instructions: Cook rice and dal together until very soft
Heat ghee and add cumin, pepper
Add ginger, cashews, curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Made during Pongal festival, comfort food
recipes.description_sinhala: ක්‍රීමි බත් සහ පරිප්පු කෑම
recipes.description_tamil: கிரீமி அரிசி மற்றும் பருப்பு உணவு
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: පොංගල් උත්සවයේදී සාදන ලද, සුවපහසු ආහාර
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: பொங்கல் பண்டிகையின் போது செய்யப்படும், ஆறுதல் உணவு

recipes.name: Bonda (Potato Fritters)
recipes.description: Spiced potato balls in gram flour batter
instructions: Mix mashed potato with onions, chilies, ginger, curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Add salt and shape into small balls
Make batter with gram flour, chili powder, asafoetida, salt
Add baking soda just before frying
recipes.cultural_notes: Popular tea-time snack
recipes.description_sinhala: ග්‍රෑම් පිටි බැටරයේ කුළුබඩු සහිත අර්තාපල් බෝල
recipes.description_tamil: கிராம் மாவு மாவில் மசாலா உருளைக்கிழங்கு உருண்டைகள்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ජනප්‍රිය තේ ටයිම් ස්නැක්

recipes.name: Kanji (Rice Porridge)
recipes.description: Simple rice porridge, comfort food
instructions: Boil with water until very soft and creamy
Temper cumin and pepper in ghee
Serve hot with papadum and pickle
recipes.cultural_notes: Given to sick people, easy to digest
recipes.description_sinhala: සරල බත් කැඳ, සුවපහසු ආහාර
recipes.description_tamil: எளிய அரிசிக் கஞ்சி, ஆறுதல் உணவு
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: රෝගී පුද්ගලයින්ට ලබා දී ඇත, දිරවීමට පහසුය

recipes.name: Galle Fish Curry
recipes.description: Rich Southern fish curry with thick coconut milk
instructions: Marinate fish with salt and turmeric
Add pandan and curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Galle's signature fish curry, very rich Use fresh fish from coastal markets. Goraka (garcinia) is essential for authentic sour taste - never substitute with tamarind. The curry should have a deep red color from roasted spices.
recipes.description_sinhala: ඝන පොල් කිරි සමග පොහොසත් දකුණු මාළු කරිය
recipes.description_tamil: அடர்த்தியான தேங்காய் பாலுடன் பணக்கார தெற்கு மீன் குழம்பு
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: Galle's signature fish curry, very rich
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: காலியின் சிக்னேச்சர் மீன் குழம்பு, மிகவும் பணக்காரமானது

recipes.name: Matara Crab Curry
recipes.description: Spicy crab curry with coconut and spices
instructions: Grind curry powder with garlic, ginger
Add curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Matara's famous crab preparation
recipes.description_sinhala: පොල් සහ කුළුබඩු සහිත කුළුබඩු සහිත කකුළුවන් කරිය
recipes.description_tamil: தேங்காய் மற்றும் மசாலாப் பொருட்களுடன் காரமான நண்டு கறி
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: මාතර ප්‍රසිද්ධ කකුළුවන් සූදානම

recipes.name: Pol Roti with Lunumiris
recipes.description: Coconut flatbread with chili sambol
ingredients: For roti: 3 cups flour, 2 cups coconut, 1 onion, 2 chilies, salt
For lunumiris: 5 chilies, 1 onion, Maldive fish, lime, salt (umbalakada - essential)
instructions: Mix flour, coconut, chopped onion, chilies
For sambol: grind chilies, onion, Maldive fish
recipes.cultural_notes: Daily Southern breakfast staple
recipes.description_sinhala: මිරිස් සම්බෝලයක් සමග පොල් තට්ටම්
recipes.description_tamil: மிளகாய் சாம்போலுடன் தேங்காய் துருவல்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: දෛනික දකුණු උදෑසන ආහාරය ප්‍රධාන ආහාරය

recipes.name: Parippu Pol Sambol
recipes.description: Lentil and coconut sambol, Southern style
recipes.cultural_notes: Protein-rich Southern sambol Must be freshly made - sambol loses flavor if stored too long. Maldive fish (umbalakada) is essential and irreplaceable. Use coconut scraped fresh, not desiccated.
recipes.description_sinhala: පරිප්පු සහ පොල් සම්බෝල, දක්ෂිණ ක්‍රමය
recipes.description_tamil: பருப்பு மற்றும் தேங்காய் சாம்போல், தெற்கு பாணி
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ප්‍රෝටීන් බහුල දකුණු සම්බෝලය

recipes.name: Katta Sambol (Chili Paste)
recipes.description: Fiery dried fish chili paste
recipes.cultural_notes: Extremely spicy, Southern favorite Must be freshly made - sambol loses flavor if stored too long. Maldive fish (umbalakada) is essential and irreplaceable. Use coconut scraped fresh, not desiccated.
recipes.description_sinhala: ගිනියම් කරවල මිරිස් පේස්ට්
recipes.description_tamil: உமிழும் உலர்ந்த மீன் மிளகாய் விழுது
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: අතිශයින්ම කුළුබඩු සහිත, දකුණු ප්රියතම

recipes.name: Pol Maalu (Coconut Fish)
recipes.description: Fish tempered with coconut
instructions: Marinate fish with turmeric and salt
Add chilies and curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Quick Southern fish dish
recipes.description_sinhala: මාළු පොල් සමග තෙම්පරාදු කර ඇත
recipes.description_tamil: தேங்காய் காய்ச்சிய மீன்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ඉක්මන් දකුණු මාළු කෑමක්

recipes.name: Ala Thel Dala (Fried Potatoes)
recipes.description: Tempered fried potatoes, Southern style
instructions: Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Common Southern side dish
recipes.description_sinhala: තෙම්පරාදු කළ බදින ලද අර්තාපල්, දක්ෂිණ විලාසිතාව
recipes.description_tamil: வறுத்த உருளைக்கிழங்கு, தெற்கு பாணி
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: පොදු දකුණු පැත්තේ කෑමක්

recipes.name: Snoek Fish Curry
recipes.description: Canned snoek fish curry, Southern favorite
instructions: Add curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Popular store-cupboard meal Use fresh fish from coastal markets. Goraka (garcinia) is essential for authentic sour taste - never substitute with tamarind. The curry should have a deep red color from roasted spices.
recipes.description_sinhala: ටින් කළ ස්නෝක් මාළු ව්‍යංජනය, දකුණු ප්‍රියතමය
recipes.description_tamil: டின்னில் அடைக்கப்பட்ட ஸ்னோக் மீன் குழம்பு, தெற்குப் பிடித்தமானது
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ජනප්‍රිය වෙළඳසැල්-කබඩ් කෑමක්

recipes.name: Murunga Leaves Malluma (Drumstick Leaves)
recipes.description: Drumstick leaves tempered with coconut
recipes.cultural_notes: Very nutritious Southern green
recipes.description_sinhala: මුරුංගා කොළ පොල් සමග පදම් කර ඇත
recipes.description_tamil: முருங்கை இலைகள் தேங்காய் துருவல்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ඉතා පෝෂ්යදායී දකුණු කොළ

recipes.name: Batu Moju (Southern Style)
recipes.description: Sweet and sour bean pickle with extra spices
instructions: Add curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Spicier than other regional versions
recipes.description_sinhala: අතිරේක කුළු බඩු සමග පැණිරස හා ඇඹුල් බෝංචි අච්චාරු
recipes.description_tamil: கூடுதல் மசாலாப் பொருட்களுடன் இனிப்பு மற்றும் புளிப்பு பீன் ஊறுகாய்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: අනෙකුත් කලාපීය අනුවාදවලට වඩා තියුණුය

recipes.name: Pol Sambol (Southern Spicy Version)
recipes.description: Extra spicy coconut sambol
recipes.cultural_notes: Southern version is notably spicier Must be freshly made - sambol loses flavor if stored too long. Maldive fish (umbalakada) is essential and irreplaceable. Use coconut scraped fresh, not desiccated.
recipes.description_sinhala: අමතර සැර පොල් සම්බෝලයක්
recipes.description_tamil: கூடுதல் காரமான தேங்காய் சாம்போல்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: දකුණු අනුවාදය සැලකිය යුතු ලෙස කුළුබඩු සහිතයි

recipes.name: Karawila Curry (Bitter Gourd)
recipes.description: Bitter gourd curry with coconut
instructions: Slice bitter gourd and soak in salt water
Fry in oil until slightly crispy
Add curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Believed to be very healthy, acquired taste
recipes.description_sinhala: පොල් සමග කරවිල කරවිල
recipes.description_tamil: தேங்காயுடன் பாகற்காய் கறி
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ඉතා සෞඛ්ය සම්පන්න, අත්පත් කරගත් රසය බව විශ්වාස කෙරේ
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: மிகவும் ஆரோக்கியமான, வாங்கிய சுவை என்று நம்பப்படுகிறது

recipes.name: Papadam (Lentil Crackers)
recipes.description: Thin crispy lentil crackers, Southern style
instructions: Add water to form stiff dough
recipes.cultural_notes: Made in bulk, sun-dried and stored
recipes.description_sinhala: සිහින් ක්‍රිස්පි පරිප්පු ක්‍රැකර්ස්, සදර්න් ස්ටයිල්
recipes.description_tamil: மெல்லிய மிருதுவான பருப்பு பட்டாசு, தெற்கு பாணி
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: තොග වශයෙන් සාදා, අව්වේ වියළා ගබඩා කර ඇත

recipes.name: Bandakka Curry (Okra)
recipes.description: Okra curry with mustard seeds
instructions: Add okra and fry on high heat
Add curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Important to dry okra well
recipes.description_sinhala: අබ ඇට සහිත බණ්ඩක්කා කරිය
recipes.description_tamil: கடுகு கொண்ட வெண்டைக்காய் கறி
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: බණ්ඩක්කා හොඳින් වියලීම වැදගත් වේ

recipes.name: Kokis (Southern Style)
recipes.description: Crispy flower-shaped cookies
instructions: Dip kokis mold in hot oil
recipes.cultural_notes: New Year essential, yellow color is traditional
recipes.description_sinhala: හැපෙනසුළු මල් හැඩැති කුකීස්
recipes.description_tamil: மிருதுவான பூ வடிவ குக்கீகள்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: අලුත් අවුරුදු අත්යවශ්ය, කහ වර්ණය සාම්ප්රදායික වේ

recipes.name: Kiri Aluwa (Milk Toffee Squares)
recipes.description: Creamy milk fudge with cashews
instructions: Boil sugar in water to syrup
recipes.cultural_notes: Popular gift during festivals
recipes.description_sinhala: කජු සමග ක්‍රීමි කිරි ෆජ්
recipes.description_tamil: முந்திரியுடன் கிரீம் பால் ஃபட்ஜ்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: උත්සව සමයේදී ජනප්‍රිය තෑග්ගක්

recipes.name: Rasa Kavili (Red Rice Flour Sweet)
recipes.description: Sweet rice flour diamonds
recipes.cultural_notes: Healthy traditional sweet
recipes.description_sinhala: මිහිරි සහල් පිටි දියමන්ති
recipes.description_tamil: இனிப்பு அரிசி மாவு வைரங்கள்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: සෞඛ්ය සම්පන්න සාම්ප්රදායික පැණිරස

recipes.name: Pol Toffee (Coconut Toffee)
recipes.description: Chewy coconut jaggery toffee
recipes.cultural_notes: Made during coconut season
recipes.description_sinhala: හපන පොල් හකුරු ටොෆි
recipes.description_tamil: Chewy coconut jaggery toffee
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: පොල් කාලෙට හදනවා

recipes.name: Aluwa (Diamond Shaped Sweet)
recipes.description: Rice flour sweet with jaggery
recipes.cultural_notes: Essential New Year sweet
recipes.description_sinhala: සහල් පිටි හකුරු සමග පැණිරසයි
recipes.description_tamil: வெல்லத்துடன் அரிசி மாவு இனிப்பு
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: අත්යවශ්ය අලුත් අවුරුද්ද මිහිරි

recipes.name: Welithalapa (Pancake Rolls)
recipes.description: Thin pancakes filled with jaggery coconut
ingredients: For pancake: 2 cups flour, 2 eggs, milk, salt
For filling: 2 cups coconut, 1 cup palm jaggery (hakuru), cardamom
instructions: Make thin batter with flour, eggs, milk
For filling: cook coconut with jaggery
recipes.cultural_notes: Traditional Sinhala New Year sweet
recipes.description_sinhala: හකුරු පොල් පිරවූ තුනී පෑන්කේක්
recipes.description_tamil: வெல்லம் தேங்காய் நிரப்பப்பட்ட மெல்லிய அப்பங்கள்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: සාම්ප්‍රදායික සිංහල අලුත් අවුරුදු මිහිරි

recipes.name: Thalaguli (Sesame Balls)
recipes.description: Sesame seed and jaggery balls
recipes.cultural_notes: Nutritious traditional sweet
recipes.description_sinhala: තල ඇට සහ හකුරු බෝල
recipes.description_tamil: எள் விதை மற்றும் வெல்லம் உருண்டைகள்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: පෝෂ්යදායී සාම්ප්රදායික පැණිරස

recipes.name: Unduwel (Sweet Coconut Balls)
recipes.description: Soft coconut jaggery balls
recipes.cultural_notes: Soft sweet for elders and children
recipes.description_sinhala: මෘදු පොල් හකුරු බෝල
recipes.description_tamil: மென்மையான தேங்காய் வெல்லம் உருண்டைகள்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: වැඩිහිටියන් හා ළමුන් සඳහා මෘදු පැණිරස

recipes.name: Thala Guli (Sesame Jaggery Balls)
recipes.description: Roasted sesame balls with jaggery
instructions: Melt jaggery to soft ball stage
recipes.cultural_notes: Good for bone health, given to children
recipes.description_sinhala: හකුරු සමග බැදපු තල බෝල
recipes.description_tamil: வெல்லத்துடன் வறுத்த எள் உருண்டைகள்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: අස්ථි සෞඛ්යයට හොඳයි, දරුවන්ට ලබා දෙයි

recipes.name: Mun Kavum (Mung Bean Cakes)
recipes.description: Sweet mung bean oil cakes
recipes.cultural_notes: Lighter version of regular kavum
recipes.description_sinhala: මිහිරි මුං ඇට තෙල් කේක්
recipes.description_tamil: இனிப்பு வெண்டைக்காய் எண்ணெய் கேக்குகள்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: සාමාන්‍ය කැවුම් වල සැහැල්ලු අනුවාදය

recipes.name: Dodol (Sticky Toffee)
recipes.description: Sticky coconut jaggery toffee
instructions: Mix rice flour with coconut milk
Cook on low heat stirring constantly
recipes.cultural_notes: Labor of love, requires constant stirring
recipes.description_sinhala: ඇලෙන සුළු පොල් හකුරු ටොෆි
recipes.description_tamil: ஒட்டும் தேங்காய் வெல்லம் டோஃபி
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ආදරයේ ශ්රමය, නිරන්තරයෙන් ඇවිස්සීම අවශ්ය වේ

recipes.name: Kiribath (Milk Rice - New Year Special)
recipes.description: Auspicious milk rice for New Year
instructions: Cook with water until almost done
Add thick coconut milk and salt
Pour onto banana leaf or flat plate
Serve with lunu miris at auspicious time
recipes.cultural_notes: Must be made at auspicious time on New Year morning Kiribath is served on all auspicious occasions. Must be eaten with lunu miris (chili sambol) and kithul treacle. Cut in diamond shapes for good luck.
recipes.description_sinhala: අලුත් අවුරුද්දට නැකත් කිරිබත්
recipes.description_tamil: புத்தாண்டுக்கு உகந்த பால் சாதம்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: අලුත් අවුරුදු උදෑසන නැකතට කළ යුතුය
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: புத்தாண்டு காலை மங்கள நேரத்தில் செய்ய வேண்டும்

recipes.name: Mung Kavum (New Year Special)
recipes.description: Traditional New Year sweet made with mung flour
instructions: Mix mung flour and rice flour
Cool and store in airtight container
recipes.cultural_notes: Essential New Year sweet, represents prosperity
recipes.description_sinhala: මුං පිටි වලින් සාදන ලද සාම්ප්‍රදායික අලුත් අවුරුදු රසකැවිලි
recipes.description_tamil: வெண்டைக்காய் மாவில் செய்யப்படும் பாரம்பரிய புத்தாண்டு இனிப்பு
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: අත්යවශ්ය අලුත් අවුරුද්ද මිහිරි, සමෘද්ධිය නියෝජනය කරයි

recipes.name: Athirasa (New Year Pancakes)
recipes.description: Sweet rice pancakes fried until puffed
instructions: Melt jaggery in water and strain
Mix rice flour with jaggery syrup
Flatten small balls into thin discs
recipes.cultural_notes: Must rest overnight for best puffing
recipes.description_sinhala: පැණිරස බත් පෑන්කේක් පිම්බෙන තෙක් බදින ලද
recipes.description_tamil: இனிப்பு அரிசி அப்பத்தை கொப்பளிக்கும் வரை வறுக்கவும்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: හොඳම පිම්ම සඳහා එක රැයකින් විවේක ගත යුතුය
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: Must rest overnight for best puffing

recipes.name: Kokis (New Year Cookies)
recipes.description: Crispy flower-shaped cookies, New Year essential
instructions: Dip hot mold in batter (don't cover top)
Kokis will drop off when ready
recipes.cultural_notes: Symbol of New Year, requires special mold
recipes.description_sinhala: හැපෙනසුළු මල් හැඩැති කුකීස්, අලුත් අවුරුදු අත්යවශ්යයි
recipes.description_tamil: மிருதுவான பூ வடிவ குக்கீகள், புத்தாண்டு அவசியம்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: අලුත් අවුරුද්දේ සංකේතය, විශේෂ අච්චුව අවශ්ය වේ

recipes.name: Aluwa (New Year Diamond Sweet)
recipes.description: Diamond-shaped rice flour sweet
instructions: Mix rice flour with jaggery syrup
recipes.cultural_notes: Easier to make than fried sweets
recipes.description_sinhala: දියමන්ති හැඩැති සහල් පිටි පැණිරසයි
recipes.description_tamil: வைர வடிவ அரிசி மாவு இனிப்பு
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: බදින ලද රසකැවිලි වලට වඩා සෑදීම පහසුය

recipes.name: Aggala (Sweet Balls)
recipes.description: Roasted rice flour balls with jaggery
instructions: Add water if needed to bind
recipes.cultural_notes: Healthy option, no oil used
recipes.description_sinhala: හකුරු සමග බැදපු හාල් පිටි බෝල
recipes.description_tamil: வெல்லத்துடன் வறுத்த அரிசி மாவு உருண்டைகள்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: සෞඛ්ය සම්පන්න විකල්පය, තෙල් භාවිතා නොවේ

recipes.name: Konda Kavum (Round Oil Cakes)
recipes.description: Round sweet cakes with treacle
instructions: Fry until dark brown and cooked through
recipes.cultural_notes: Variant of regular kavum, rounder shape
recipes.description_sinhala: ට්‍රේකල් සමඟ රවුම් මිහිරි කේක්
recipes.description_tamil: வட்டமான இனிப்பு கேக்குகள்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: සාමාන්‍ය කැවුම් වල ප්‍රභේදය, රවුම් හැඩය

recipes.name: Pani Dodol (Jaggery Coconut Toffee)
recipes.description: Quick jaggery coconut sweet for New Year
instructions: Test by dropping in water - should form ball
recipes.cultural_notes: Faster version of traditional dodol
recipes.description_sinhala: අලුත් අවුරුද්දට ඉක්මන් හකුරු පොල් පැණි
recipes.description_tamil: புத்தாண்டுக்கு விரைவு வெல்லம் தேங்காய் இனிப்பு
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: සාම්ප්රදායික ඩොඩොල්හි වේගවත් අනුවාදය

recipes.name: Dansala Rice (Vesak Free Food)
recipes.description: Simple rice meal distributed free during Vesak
recipes.cultural_notes: Offered free to public during Vesak
recipes.description_sinhala: වෙසක් සමයේ නොමිලේ බෙදා දෙන සරල බත් වේලක්
recipes.description_tamil: வெசாக் காலத்தில் எளிய அரிசி உணவு இலவசமாக வழங்கப்படும்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: වෙසක් සමයේ මහජනතාවට නොමිලේ පිරිනැමේ

recipes.name: Kiribath for Vesak
recipes.description: Milk rice for temple offerings
recipes.cultural_notes: Traditional temple offering on Vesak
recipes.description_sinhala: පන්සලේ පූජාවට කිරිබත්
recipes.description_tamil: கோவில் பிரசாதத்திற்கு பால் சாதம்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: වෙසක් දා සාම්ප්‍රදායික පන්සල් පූජාව

recipes.name: Dansala Noodles
recipes.description: Fried noodles for Vesak distribution
recipes.cultural_notes: Modern dansala favorite
recipes.description_sinhala: වෙසක් බෙදාහැරීම සඳහා බැදපු නූඩ්ල්ස්
recipes.description_tamil: வெசாக் விநியோகத்திற்காக வறுத்த நூடுல்ஸ்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: නවීන දන්සල ප්රියතම

recipes.name: Poson Porridge
recipes.description: Sweet coconut milk porridge for Poson
instructions: Boil coconut milk with jaggery (Never boil coconut milk vigorously - it will curdle)
recipes.cultural_notes: Offered at temples during Poson
recipes.description_sinhala: පොසොන් එකට පැණි පොල් කිරි කැඳ
recipes.description_tamil: பொசனுக்கு இனிப்பு தேங்காய் பால் கஞ்சி
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: පොසොන් කාලෙට පන්සල්වල පූජා කරනවා

recipes.name: Vesak Kavili (Festival Sweet)
recipes.description: Simple sweet for Vesak distribution
recipes.cultural_notes: Simple sweet for mass distribution
recipes.description_sinhala: වෙසක් බෙදාහැරීම සඳහා සරල පැණිරස
recipes.description_tamil: வெசாக் விநியோகத்திற்கான எளிய இனிப்பு
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: මහා බෙදාහැරීම සඳහා සරල පැණිරස

recipes.name: Wattalappam (Eid Special)
recipes.description: Rich coconut custard for Eid celebration
recipes.cultural_notes: Essential Eid dessert, served to guests
recipes.description_sinhala: ඊද් උත්සවය සඳහා පොහොසත් පොල් කස්ටඩ්
recipes.description_tamil: ஈத் கொண்டாட்டத்திற்கு பணக்கார தேங்காய் துருவல்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: අත්යවශ්ය Eid අතුරුපස, අමුත්තන්ට සේවය කර ඇත

recipes.name: Buriyani (Eid Feast)
recipes.description: Fragrant layered rice with meat for Eid
instructions: Marinate meat with yogurt and spices
Layer rice and meat in pot
Cover and cook on low heat (dum) for 30 min
recipes.cultural_notes: Main dish for Eid celebrations
recipes.description_sinhala: ඊද් සඳහා මස් සමඟ සුවඳ ස්ථර සහල්
recipes.description_tamil: ஈத் பண்டிகைக்காக இறைச்சியுடன் கூடிய வாசனை அடுக்கு அரிசி
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ඊද් උත්සව සඳහා ප්රධාන ආහාරය

recipes.name: Aasmi (Eid Sweet)
recipes.description: Crispy swirled sweets in sugar syrup
recipes.cultural_notes: Colorful Eid sweet, very popular
recipes.description_sinhala: සීනි සිරප් වල හැපෙනසුළු කරකැවෙන රසකැවිලි
recipes.description_tamil: சர்க்கரை பாகில் மிருதுவான சுழல் இனிப்புகள்
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: වර්ණවත් ඊද් මිහිරි, ඉතා ජනප්‍රිය

recipes.name: Bole (Eid Bread)
recipes.description: Sweet bread for Eid breakfast
instructions: Activate yeast with warm coconut milk
recipes.cultural_notes: Eid morning breakfast staple
recipes.description_sinhala: ඊද් උදෑසන ආහාරය සඳහා පැණිරස පාන්
recipes.description_tamil: ஈத் காலை உணவுக்கு இனிப்பு ரொட்டி
