Freedom from Torture currently works with more torture survivors from Haarun says:
Sri Lanka than from any other country. The Tamil Support Group provides a
safe, sociable environment for survivors from the Tamil community. Like other “Before Freedom from Torture I didn’t know anyone and I had many
torture survivors, our Tamil clients are often indelibly scarred, isolated and problems. I had nowhere to live and I struggled financially. The group has
suffering from Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD). helped me, the welfare people gave me good advice and helped me find
somewhere to live. The therapy saved my life.”
The Tamil Support Group has become so important to its members that many
have come to call it their family. Here they can open up because they are Cooking is so important within the Tamil community. It provides a link
with others who have suffered similarly. It helps them cope, relieves anxiety, with their beloved homeland, and makes it easier to bear the burdens of exile
provides support and makes them feel valued again. and dispersion. This book enables us to share some of those memories and
stories, and we hope you enjoy reading and recreating their recipes.
Freedom from Torture’s support groups are a vital, unique part of our care
for people who have been tortured and they only exist because of the
One person who benefits from the Tamil Group is Haarun.
Haarun was detained and tortured by government forces after he was
accused of supporting the Tamil Tigers. He was released only after his family
sold everything they had to pay a bribe.
After Haarun fled to the UK in fear of his life, he lost everything. In Sri Lanka
he had a family, a home, a degree and a job. Here he found himself sleeping
When he came to Freedom from Torture he felt lost and alone and was
having suicidal thoughts. We gave him welfare advice and one to one
therapy. Gradually he started to recover. He joined the Tamil Support Group
and found people who had gone through the same experiences of torture
Since 1985 Freedom from Torture has been supporting people whose lives
have been devastated by torture. Our expert staff and volunteers are here
to help men, women, children and families to recover from the unimaginable
pain that they have endured, supporting them as they rebuild their lives
As well as counselling and psychological support, we offer valuable group
therapies, such as gardening, art, cookery, and community focused groups
such as our Tamil Support Group. By coming together to grow herbs and
vegetables, paint, or bake bread, torture survivors are able to find a way
to deal with the unspeakable. These groups and communities offer a safe
place for survivors to open up about their experiences, build lasting
friendships and discover the freedom to be themselves.
Cooking and sharing food is incredibly valuable to survivors of torture who
have been forced to flee their homelands. In many cases the taste or smell
of a cake, spice or fresh fruit can help to bring back memories of their
loved ones, whilst helping them to re-connect with their culture.
This book is a celebration of food, memories, and our Tamil community.
The members of The Tamil Group
Paul Merrett, for his powerful words and ongoing support
Spread London, food styling and assistance
Samuel Morton and Amy Salt, Freedom from Torture

recipes.name: Curry Recipe
ingredients: 4. 2 Banana Peppers (Malu miris) or green bell pepper
instructions: Slice the half of the onion the regular way and the other half in to
2-inch size pieces. Cut the Chicken breasts in to small pieces. Slice the
outside of the Tomato in to 2-inch pieces and chop the middle part and
leave it aside. Heat the cooking oil and add the chopped Onions, rampe,
curry leaves, chopped green chilies and cinnamon and let it fry. Then add (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
chopped garlic, ginger, turmeric powder, salt, sliced chicken and Tamarind
juice and let it boil for a while. You will get a nice yellow curry. Do not
add water or coconut milk in to it. When it's done add the chopped middle
part of the tomato. Then add crushed pepper, sliced tomato (big pieces),
sliced banana pepper, onions (2 inch sliced) and a bit of salt and let it
simmer for a while and enjoy it. You can add a little bit of chili powder
but make black pepper the main ingredient.

instructions: Cut the beef in 1/2-inch cubes and season with vinegar,

ginger, cinnamon, cloves, cardamoms and lemongrass and set aside.

heat a pan with little oil and add rampe,
curry leaves and onion and stir (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
until onions are light brown. Then add the beef mixture and stir well.
Stir occasionally, scraping off the bottom.
When cooked, add the fried potato cubes and spread the lime juice and

recipes.name: Contents Meals
recipes.description: The recipes that each team prepared were received beforehand. In this round,
ingredients: during food preparation and final presentation of the food were included. Teams
were selected based on the recipes, video recordings, and live judging. 5 teams
out of the 20 teams that contested were selected. Winning teams were
announced in a meeting with the contestants in the presence of the jury.
The Final round of the National Low salt Cooking Challenge was successfully held
on the 30th of October 2021, at Galle Face Hotel. Prior to the event a virtual press
conference was held by Dr Renuka Jayatissa The president - Sri Lanka Medical
Nutrition Association, on the 25th of October 2021, to raise awareness about the
importance of low salt consumption among the public.
The final event started at 3.30 pm in the presence of the delegates who were
invited. It was held strictly adhering to the COVID 19 safety rules. Madam Shiranthi
Wickramasinghe Rajapaksa (1st Lady to the 5th executive President of Sri Lanka,
current Prime minister) attended the event as the chief guest. Dr. Amal Harsha de
Silva, Secretary - State Ministry of Backward Rural Areas Development and
Promotion of Domestic Animal Husbandry & Minor Economic Crop Cultivation, Dr.
Olivia Nieveras, Public Health Administrator for World Health Organization, Sri
Lanka participated as guests of honor. Officials from the Ministry of Health, World
Health Organization, members of Sri Lanka Medical Nutrition Association, and
Chefs Guild of Lanka also took part in the event.

recipes.name: Kola Kenda (Herbal Porridge)
recipes.description: A nutritious herbal porridge made with green leaves, rice, and coconut milk. A traditional village breakfast known for its medicinal properties and given to new mothers.
instructions: Wash and chop all leaves finely
Grind soaked rice with shallots and garlic to a paste
Boil thin coconut milk with pandan leaf (Never boil coconut milk vigorously - it will curdle)
Add rice paste and stir continuously
Add chopped leaves and cook for 10 minutes
Add thick coconut milk and salt
recipes.cultural_notes: Given to new mothers for strength and health. Each family has their own combination of greens.
recipes.description_sinhala: කොළ, සහල් සහ පොල් කිරි වලින් සාදන ලද පෝෂ්‍යදායී ඔසු කැඳ. ඖෂධීය ගුණ සඳහා ප්‍රසිද්ධ සහ අලුත් මව්වරුන්ට දෙන සම්ප්‍රදායික ගමේ උදේ ආහාරය.
recipes.description_tamil: பச்சை இலைகள், அரிசி மற்றும் தேங்காய் பால் ஆகியவற்றால் செய்யப்பட்ட ஒரு சத்தான மூலிகை கஞ்சி. ஒரு பாரம்பரிய கிராம காலை உணவு அதன் மருத்துவ குணங்களுக்கு பெயர் பெற்றது மற்றும் புதிய தாய்மார்களுக்கு வழங்கப்படுகிறது.
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ශක්තිය සහ සෞඛ්යය සඳහා නව මව්වරුන්ට ලබා දී ඇත. සෑම පවුලකටම තමන්ගේම හරිතයන් සංයෝජනයක් ඇත.
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: வலிமை மற்றும் ஆரோக்கியத்திற்காக புதிய தாய்மார்களுக்கு வழங்கப்படுகிறது. ஒவ்வொரு குடும்பத்திற்கும் அதன் சொந்த கீரைகள் உள்ளன.

recipes.name: Rathu Malu Curry (Red Fish Curry)
recipes.description: A deep red fish curry made with roasted spices and goraka. The hallmark of Southern coastal cooking with intense flavors.
ingredients: 500g seer fish or tuna, cut into pieces
3 tbsp coconut oil (traditional - do not substitute)
instructions: Soak goraka in warm water for 10 minutes
Mix fish with turmeric and salt, set aside
Heat coconut oil and temper curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Add onions and sauté until golden
Add all dry spices and fry for 2 minutes
Pour thin coconut milk and add goraka water
Simmer on low heat for 15 minutes
Add thick coconut milk and green chilies
Cook for 5 more minutes without stirring
recipes.cultural_notes: The sourness from goraka is irreplaceable - never substitute with tamarind. Best eaten with red rice. Use fresh fish from coastal markets. Goraka (garcinia) is essential for authentic sour taste - never substitute with tamarind. The curry should have a deep red color from roasted spices.
recipes.description_sinhala: බැදපු කුළුබඩු සහ ගොරකා එක්ක හදපු තද රතු පාට මාළු වෑංජනයක්. දැඩි රසයන් සහිත දකුණු වෙරළබඩ ඉවුම් පිහුම් වල ලක්ෂණය.
recipes.description_tamil: வறுத்த மசாலா மற்றும் கோரக்காவுடன் செய்யப்பட்ட அடர் சிவப்பு மீன் குழம்பு. தீவிர சுவைகள் கொண்ட தெற்கு கடற்கரை சமையலின் தனிச்சிறப்பு.
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ගොරකා වල ඇඹුල පිරවිය නොහැකියි - කිසිවිටෙක සියඹලා ආදේශ කරන්න එපා. රතු බත් සමඟ ආහාරයට ගැනීම වඩාත් සුදුසුය. වෙරළබඩ වෙළඳපොලේ නැවුම් මාළු භාවිතා කරන්න. ගොරකා (ගාර්සීනියා) අව්‍යාජ ඇඹුල් රසය සඳහා අත්‍යවශ්‍ය වේ - කිසි විටෙකත් සියඹලා සමඟ ආදේශ නොකරන්න. වෑංජනය බැදපු කුළුබඩු වලින් තද රතු පැහැයක් තිබිය යුතුය.
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: கோரக்காவின் புளிப்பு ஈடுசெய்ய முடியாதது - புளியை ஒருபோதும் மாற்ற முடியாது. சிவப்பு அரிசியுடன் சாப்பிடுவது சிறந்தது. கடலோர சந்தைகளில் இருந்து புதிய மீன்களைப் பயன்படுத்துங்கள். உண்மையான புளிப்பு சுவைக்கு கோரக்கா (கார்சினியா) அவசியம் - புளியை ஒருபோதும் மாற்ற வேண்டாம். வறுத்த மசாலாவிலிருந்து கறி அடர் சிவப்பு நிறத்தில் இருக்க வேண்டும்.

recipes.name: Murunga Leaves Mallung
recipes.description: Finely chopped drumstick leaves tempered with coconut and spices. A nutritious village favorite.
ingredients: 1 tbsp coconut oil (traditional - do not substitute)
instructions: Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add onions and green chilies, sauté
Cook on low heat for 5 minutes
Add lime juice and curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
recipes.cultural_notes: Murunga leaves are considered a superfood in villages. Must be finely chopped for proper texture.
recipes.description_sinhala: සිහින්ව කපාගත් මුරුංගා කොළ පොල් සහ කුළුබඩු සමග පදම් කර ඇත. පෝෂ්‍යදායී ගමේ ප්‍රියතම එකක්.
recipes.description_tamil: தேங்காய் மற்றும் மசாலாப் பொருட்களுடன் நன்றாக துண்டாக்கப்பட்ட முருங்கை இலைகள். சத்தான கிராமம் பிடித்தது.
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: මුරුංගා කොළ ගම්වල සුපිරි ආහාරයක් ලෙස සැලකේ. නිසි වයනය සඳහා සිහින් ව කපා ගත යුතුය.
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: முருங்கை இலைகள் கிராமங்களில் சூப்பர் உணவாகக் கருதப்படுகிறது. சரியான அமைப்புக்கு நன்றாக வெட்டப்பட வேண்டும்.

recipes.name: Wade (Lentil Fritters)
recipes.description: Crispy deep-fried lentil fritters sold by street vendors. Perfect tea-time snack.
instructions: Grind coarsely with minimal water to a thick batter
Add all other ingredients to batter
Mix well without adding extra water
Wet hands and take small portions
Flatten into discs with a hole in center
Drain on paper and serve hot
recipes.cultural_notes: Must be eaten hot and crispy. The hole in the center ensures even frying. Every corner shop sells these.
recipes.description_sinhala: වීදි වෙළෙන්දන් විසින් විකුණන ලද හැපෙනසුළු ගැඹුරු බැදපු පරිප්පු බැදපු. පරිපූර්ණ තේ-කාල කෙටි කෑමක්.
recipes.description_tamil: தெருவோர வியாபாரிகளால் விற்கப்படும் மிருதுவான ஆழமான வறுத்த பருப்பு பஜ்ஜி. சரியான தேநீர் நேர சிற்றுண்டி.
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: උණුසුම් හා හැපෙනසුළු ලෙස ආහාරයට ගත යුතුය. මධ්යයේ කුහරය ඒකාකාරව බැදීම සහතික කරයි. හැම අස්සක් මුල්ලක් නෑරම මේවා විකුණනවා.
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: சூடாகவும் மிருதுவாகவும் சாப்பிட வேண்டும். மையத்தில் உள்ள துளை சீரான வறுக்கப்படுவதை உறுதி செய்கிறது. ஒவ்வொரு மூலைக்கடையிலும் இவற்றை விற்கிறார்கள்.

recipes.name: Kevum (Deep Fried Sweet)
recipes.description: Traditional oil cake made for Sinhala New Year with rice flour and treacle. Diamond-shaped crispy sweets.
instructions: Mix rice flour with salt and cardamom
Warm treacle slightly and add to flour
Add coconut milk gradually to make thick dough
Knead well and rest for 30 minutes
Heat oil in a deep pan
Take small portions and shape into diamonds
Deep fry on medium heat until dark brown
Drain and cool completely before storing
recipes.cultural_notes: Essential for Sinhala New Year. Must be fried slowly to cook through. Stored in airtight containers for weeks.
recipes.description_sinhala: සිංහල අලුත් අවුරුද්දට හාල් පිටි සහ ට්‍රේකල් යොදා සාදන ලද සම්ප්‍රදායික තෙල් කේක්. දියමන්ති හැඩැති රසට හැපෙන රසකැවිලි.
recipes.description_tamil: சிங்கள புத்தாண்டுக்காக அரிசி மாவு மற்றும் ட்ரேக்கிள் கொண்டு தயாரிக்கப்பட்ட பாரம்பரிய எண்ணெய் கேக். வைர வடிவ மிருதுவான இனிப்புகள்.
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: සිංහල අලුත් අවුරුද්දට අත්‍යවශ්‍යයි. ආහාර පිසීම සඳහා සෙමින් බදින ලද යුතුය. සති ගණනක් වාතය රහිත බහාලුම්වල ගබඩා කර ඇත.
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: சிங்கள புத்தாண்டுக்கு இன்றியமையாதது. சமைக்க மெதுவாக வறுக்க வேண்டும். வாரக்கணக்கில் காற்று புகாத கொள்கலன்களில் சேமிக்கப்படுகிறது.

recipes.name: Appa (Hoppers)
recipes.description: Bowl-shaped pancakes with crispy edges and soft center. Made with fermented rice batter and coconut milk.
instructions: Grind soaked rice with little water to smooth paste
Mix yeast with sugar and warm water, let foam
Combine rice paste, rice flour, coconut milk
Cover and ferment for 4-6 hours or overnight
Heat hopper pan and grease lightly
Pour ladle of batter and swirl to coat edges
Cover and cook until edges are crispy and center is soft
recipes.cultural_notes: Requires special hopper pan. Eat with sambol and curry. Morning favorite across all communities.
recipes.description_sinhala: හැපෙනසුළු දාර සහ මෘදු මධ්‍යයක් සහිත බඳුනක හැඩැති පෑන්කේක්. පැසුණු බත් බැටරය සහ පොල් කිරි වලින් සාදා ඇත.
recipes.description_tamil: மிருதுவான விளிம்புகள் மற்றும் மென்மையான மையத்துடன் கிண்ண வடிவ அப்பத்தை. புளித்த அரிசி மாவு மற்றும் தேங்காய் பால் கொண்டு தயாரிக்கப்படுகிறது.
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: විශේෂ ආප්ප පෑන් අවශ්ය වේ. සම්බෝල සහ කරපිංචා සමග කන්න. සියලුම ප්‍රජාවන් හරහා ප්‍රියතම උදෑසන.
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: சிறப்பு ஹாப்பர் பான் தேவை. சாம்போல் மற்றும் கறியுடன் சாப்பிடவும். அனைத்து சமூகங்களுக்கும் பிடித்தமான காலை.

recipes.name: Jaffna Crab Curry
recipes.description: Fiery crab curry with roasted Jaffna curry powder. No coconut milk - just pure spice and crab.
ingredients: 1 tbsp fennel seeds, roasted and ground
instructions: Heat sesame oil and fry curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Add all dry spices and fry until fragrant
Add tomatoes and cook until mushy
Add crab pieces and coat with masala
Add tamarind water and enough water to cover
Cover and cook on low heat for 20 minutes
Add green chilies and simmer until thick gravy forms
recipes.cultural_notes: Jaffna style never uses coconut milk. The sesame oil and fennel are signature flavors. Best with pittu.
recipes.description_sinhala: බැදපු යාපනේ කරි කුඩු සමග ගිනි කකුළු ව්‍යංජනය. පොල් කිරි නැත - පිරිසිදු කුළුබඩු සහ කකුළුවන් පමණි.
recipes.description_tamil: வறுத்த யாழ்ப்பாண கறி பொடியுடன் உமிழும் நண்டு கறி. தேங்காய் பால் இல்லை - சுத்தமான மசாலா மற்றும் நண்டு.
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: යාපනයේ විලාසිතාව කිසිවිටෙක පොල් කිරි භාවිතා නොකරයි. තල තෙල් සහ මහදුරු අත්සන රසකාරක වේ. පිට්ටු සමඟ හොඳම.
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: யாழ்ப்பாண பாணி ஒருபோதும் தேங்காய்ப் பாலை பயன்படுத்துவதில்லை. எள் எண்ணெய் மற்றும் பெருஞ்சீரகம் ஆகியவை கையொப்ப சுவைகள். பிட்டுவுடன் சிறந்தது.

recipes.name: Elabatu Curry (Brinjal Curry)
recipes.description: Smoky brinjal curry cooked with mustard seeds and fenugreek. Village-style preparation.
ingredients: 2 tbsp coconut oil (traditional - do not substitute)
instructions: Roast brinjals directly on flame until skin is charred
Peel skin and mash the flesh
Heat coconut oil, add mustard and fenugreek
When seeds pop, add curry leaves and onions (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Add mashed brinjal and mix well
Add coconut milk and simmer for 10 minutes
recipes.cultural_notes: Roasting over open flame gives authentic smoky flavor. Fenugreek is essential for village taste.
recipes.description_sinhala: අබ ඇට සහ මහදුරු සමග පිසූ දුම් බටු ව්‍යංජනය. ගමේ ආකාරයේ සූදානම.
recipes.description_tamil: கடுகு மற்றும் வெந்தயத்துடன் சமைத்த புகை கத்தரி கறி. கிராம பாணி தயாரிப்பு.
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: විවෘත ගින්දර මත පුළුස්සා දැමීම අව්‍යාජ දුම් රසයක් ලබා දෙයි. ගමේ රසයට මහදුරු අත්‍යවශ්‍යයි.
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: திறந்த சுடரில் வறுத்தெடுப்பது உண்மையான புகை சுவையை அளிக்கிறது. கிராமத்து சுவைக்கு வெந்தயம் இன்றியமையாதது.

recipes.name: Kiribath (Milk Rice)
recipes.description: Coconut milk rice served on auspicious occasions. The first food eaten on Sinhala New Year.
instructions: Wash rice and cook with water and pandan leaf
When rice is 80% cooked and water absorbed
Stir gently and cook on low heat
When all liquid absorbed, turn off heat
Spread on flat tray to 1-inch thickness
Cool slightly and cut into diamond shapes
recipes.cultural_notes: Must be the first food on New Year. Cut in diamond shapes. Always served with lunu miris and jaggery. Kiribath is served on all auspicious occasions. Must be eaten with lunu miris (chili sambol) and kithul treacle. Cut in diamond shapes for good luck.
recipes.description_sinhala: පොල් කිරි බත් සුබ නැකැත්වලට පිළිගැන්වේ. සිංහල අලුත් අවුරුද්දේ කන පළමු ආහාරය.
recipes.description_tamil: மங்களகரமான சந்தர்ப்பங்களில் பரிமாறப்படும் தேங்காய் பால் சாதம். சிங்கள புத்தாண்டில் உண்ணப்படும் முதல் உணவு.
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: අලුත් අවුරුද්දේ පළමු ආහාරය විය යුතුය. දියමන්ති හැඩයට කපන්න. සෑම විටම ලුණු මිරිස් සහ හකුරු සමඟ සේවය කරනු ලැබේ. සියලුම නැකත් උත්සවවලදී කිරිබත් පිරිනමනු ලැබේ. ලුණු මිරිස් (මිරිස් සම්බෝලය) සහ කිතුල් කරල් සමග ආහාරයට ගත යුතුය. වාසනාව සඳහා දියමන්ති හැඩයට කපන්න.
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: புத்தாண்டு அன்று முதல் உணவாக இருக்க வேண்டும். வைர வடிவங்களில் வெட்டவும். எப்போதும் லுனு மிரிஸ் மற்றும் வெல்லத்துடன் பரிமாறப்படும். அனைத்து சுப நிகழ்ச்சிகளிலும் கிரிபாத் வழங்கப்படுகிறது. லுனு மிளகாய் (மிளகாய் சம்போல்) மற்றும் கித்துல் ட்ரேக்கிள் உடன் சாப்பிட வேண்டும். நல்ல அதிர்ஷ்டத்திற்காக வைர வடிவங்களில் வெட்டுங்கள்.

recipes.name: Isso Wade (Prawn Cutlets)
recipes.description: Crispy prawn fritters mixed with lentils and spices. Popular tea-time snack.
instructions: Add onions, chilies, fennel, curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Drop spoonfuls of batter into hot oil
recipes.cultural_notes: Coastal version of wade with prawns. Must be crispy outside and soft inside.
recipes.description_sinhala: පරිප්පු සහ කුළුබඩු සමඟ මිශ්‍ර කර ඇති ක්‍රිස්පි ඉස්සන් බැදපු. ජනප්‍රිය තේ ටයිම් ස්නැක්.
recipes.description_tamil: பருப்பு மற்றும் மசாலா கலந்த மிருதுவான இறால் பொரியல். பிரபலமான தேநீர் நேர சிற்றுண்டி.
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ඉස්සන් සහිත වඩේ වෙරළබඩ අනුවාදය. පිටතින් හැපෙනසුළු විය යුතු අතර ඇතුළත මෘදු විය යුතුය.
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: இறால்களுடன் கூடிய வேட்டின் கரையோர பதிப்பு. வெளியில் மிருதுவாகவும் உள்ளே மென்மையாகவும் இருக்க வேண்டும்.

recipes.name: Parippu Vade (Lentil Fritters)
recipes.description: Crispy lentil fritters with onions and green chilies. Evening snack favorite.
ingredients: 2 cups split chickpeas (kadala parippu), soaked 2 hours
instructions: Add all ingredients and mix well
Deep fry in hot oil until golden
Drain and serve hot with coconut chutney
recipes.cultural_notes: Different from ulundu wade - uses chickpeas. Must be coarsely ground for texture.
recipes.description_sinhala: ලූනු සහ අමු මිරිස් සමග හැපෙනසුළු පරිප්පු බැදපු. සවස් වරුවේ ප්රියතම.
recipes.description_tamil: வெங்காயம் மற்றும் பச்சை மிளகாயுடன் மிருதுவான பருப்பு பஜ்ஜி. மாலை நேர சிற்றுண்டி பிடித்தமானது.
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: උළුඳු වඩේට වඩා වෙනස් - කඩල භාවිතා කරයි. වයනය සඳහා රළු බිම් විය යුතුය.
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: உளுந்து வடையிலிருந்து வேறுபட்டது - கொண்டைக்கடலையைப் பயன்படுத்துகிறது. அமைப்புக்கு கரடுமுரடானதாக இருக்க வேண்டும்.

recipes.name: Gotu Kola Sambol (Pennywort Salad)
recipes.description: Fresh herb salad with gotu kola, coconut, and lime. Known for brain health.
ingredients: 2 cups gotu kola leaves, finely chopped
instructions: Wash and finely chop gotu kola
Add shallots, green chili, chili powder
recipes.cultural_notes: Must be eaten fresh. Known to improve memory. Never cooked - always raw. Must be freshly made - sambol loses flavor if stored too long. Maldive fish (umbalakada) is essential and irreplaceable. Use coconut scraped fresh, not desiccated.
recipes.description_sinhala: ගොටුකොළ, පොල්, දෙහි සමග නැවුම් ඔසු සලාද. මොළයේ සෞඛ්යය සඳහා ප්රසිද්ධය.
recipes.description_tamil: கோது கோலா, தேங்காய் மற்றும் சுண்ணாம்பு கொண்ட புதிய மூலிகை சாலட். மூளை ஆரோக்கியத்திற்கு பெயர் பெற்றது.
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: නැවුම්ව ආහාරයට ගත යුතුය. මතකය වැඩි දියුණු කිරීම සඳහා ප්රසිද්ධය. කිසි විටෙකත් පිසිනු නොලැබේ - සෑම විටම අමු. නැවුම්ව සාදා තිබිය යුතුය - වැඩි කාලයක් ගබඩා කළහොත් සම්බෝලයේ රසය නැති වේ. මාලදිවයින් මාළු (උම්බලකඩ) අත්‍යාවශ්‍ය සහ ප්‍රතිස්ථාපනය කළ නොහැකි ය. වියළන ලද නොව නැවුම් නැවුම් පොල් භාවිතා කරන්න.
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: புதிதாக சாப்பிட வேண்டும். நினைவகத்தை மேம்படுத்த அறியப்படுகிறது. ஒருபோதும் சமைக்கப்படவில்லை - எப்போதும் பச்சையாக இருக்கும். புதிதாகத் தயாரிக்கப்பட வேண்டும் - அதிக நேரம் சேமித்து வைத்தால் சாம்போல் சுவையை இழக்கும். மாலத்தீவு மீன் (உம்பலகடா) அத்தியாவசியமானது மற்றும் ஈடுசெய்ய முடியாதது. தேங்காயைத் துருவிய தேங்காயைப் புதிதாகப் பயன்படுத்தவும், உலர்த்தாமல் இருக்கவும்.

recipes.name: Pittu (Steamed Rice Flour)
recipes.description: Steamed cylinders of rice flour and coconut. Traditional breakfast staple.
ingredients: 2 cups red rice flour (or white rice flour)
instructions: Sprinkle water on rice flour and mix to breadcrumb texture
Layer coconut and flour mixture in pittu bamboo
Start with coconut, then flour, alternating
Steam in pittu maker for 10 minutes
Remove and serve hot with curry
recipes.cultural_notes: Requires special pittu bamboo cylinder. Perfect with kadala curry or fish curry.
recipes.description_sinhala: සහල් පිටි සහ පොල් තැම්බූ සිලින්ඩර. සාම්ප්රදායික උදෑසන ආහාරය.
recipes.description_tamil: அரிசி மாவு மற்றும் தேங்காய் வேகவைத்த சிலிண்டர்கள். பாரம்பரிய காலை உணவு.
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: විශේෂ පිට්ටු උණ බම්බු සිලින්ඩරයක් අවශ්‍ය වේ. කඩල ව්‍යංජන හෝ මාළු ව්‍යංජන සමඟ පරිපූර්ණයි.
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: சிறப்பு பிட்டு மூங்கில் சிலிண்டர் தேவை. கடலா கறி அல்லது மீன் குழம்புக்கு ஏற்றது.

recipes.name: Kothamalli Sambol (Coriander Sambol)
recipes.description: Fresh coriander chutney with Maldive fish and lime. Perfect accompaniment.
instructions: Blend all ingredients except lime juice
Serve fresh with rice and curry
recipes.cultural_notes: Maldive fish is essential for authentic taste. Must be made fresh daily. Must be freshly made - sambol loses flavor if stored too long. Maldive fish (umbalakada) is essential and irreplaceable. Use coconut scraped fresh, not desiccated.
recipes.description_sinhala: මාලදිවයිනේ මාළු සහ දෙහි සමග නැවුම් කොත්තමල්ලි චට්නි. පරිපූර්ණ සහකාරිය.
recipes.description_tamil: மாலத்தீவு மீன் மற்றும் சுண்ணாம்புடன் புதிய கொத்தமல்லி சட்னி. சரியான துணை.
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: මාලදිවයිනේ මාළු අව්යාජ රසය සඳහා අත්යවශ්ය වේ. දිනපතා නැවුම් කළ යුතුය. නැවුම්ව සාදා තිබිය යුතුය - වැඩි කාලයක් ගබඩා කළහොත් සම්බෝලයේ රසය නැති වේ. මාලදිවයින් මාළු (උම්බලකඩ) අත්‍යාවශ්‍ය සහ ප්‍රතිස්ථාපනය කළ නොහැකි ය. වියළන ලද නොව නැවුම් නැවුම් පොල් භාවිතා කරන්න.
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: மாலத்தீவு மீன் உண்மையான சுவைக்கு அவசியம். Must be made fresh daily. புதிதாகத் தயாரிக்கப்பட வேண்டும் - அதிக நேரம் சேமித்து வைத்தால் சாம்போல் சுவையை இழக்கும். மாலத்தீவு மீன் (உம்பலகடா) அத்தியாவசியமானது மற்றும் ஈடுசெய்ய முடியாதது. தேங்காயைத் துருவிய தேங்காயைப் புதிதாகப் பயன்படுத்தவும், உலர்த்தாமல் இருக்கவும்.

recipes.name: Malu Paan (Fish Buns)
recipes.description: Soft buns filled with spicy fish mixture. Bakery favorite breakfast item.
ingredients: For dough: 4 cups flour, 1 packet yeast, 2 tbsp sugar, 1/2 cup butter, 1 cup warm milk, 1 egg, 1 tsp salt
For filling: 400g canned tuna, 2 onions chopped, 3 green chilies, curry leaves, 1 tsp chili powder, 1 tsp curry powder, lime juice (fresh, not dried)
instructions: Make dough: Mix yeast, sugar, warm milk. Add to flour with egg, butter, salt
Knead to soft dough, proof for 1 hour
For filling: Sauté onions, add spices, add drained tuna, add chilies and lime
Fill with fish mixture, seal edges
Bake at 180°C for 20 minutes until golden
recipes.cultural_notes: Every Sri Lankan bakery sells these. Morning commuters' favorite. Must be soft and fluffy.
recipes.description_sinhala: කුළුබඩු සහිත මාළු මිශ්‍රණයෙන් පිරුණු මෘදු බනිස්. බේකරි ප්‍රියතම උදෑසන ආහාරය.
recipes.description_tamil: காரமான மீன் கலவையால் நிரப்பப்பட்ட மென்மையான பன்கள். பேக்கரியில் பிடித்த காலை உணவு.
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ලංකාවේ හැම බේකරියකම මේවා විකුණනවා. උදෑසන මගීන්ගේ ප්රියතම. මෘදු හා සිනිඳු විය යුතුය.
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: ஒவ்வொரு இலங்கை பேக்கரியும் இவற்றை விற்பனை செய்கின்றன. காலை வேளையில் பயணிப்பவர்களுக்கு மிகவும் பிடித்தமானது. மென்மையாகவும் பஞ்சுபோன்றதாகவும் இருக்க வேண்டும்.

recipes.name: Lunumiris (Chili Onion Sambol)
recipes.description: Spicy ground mixture of chili, onions, and Maldive fish. Essential with kiribath.
instructions: Remove seeds from chilies if you want less heat
Grind chilies, onion, Maldive fish, and salt together
Grind to coarse paste, not fine
Store in fridge for up to a week
recipes.cultural_notes: Must be on the table for kiribath. Every family has their own heat level. Texture should be coarse, not smooth. Must be freshly made - sambol loses flavor if stored too long. Maldive fish (umbalakada) is essential and irreplaceable. Use coconut scraped fresh, not desiccated.
recipes.description_sinhala: මිරිස්, ළූණු සහ මාලදිවයිනේ මාළු කුළුබඩු මිශ්‍රණය. කිරිබත් සමඟ අත්‍යවශ්‍යයි.
recipes.description_tamil: மிளகாய், வெங்காயம் மற்றும் மாலத்தீவு மீன் ஆகியவற்றின் காரமான அரைத்த கலவை. கிரிபாத்துடன் அவசியம்.
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: කිරිබත් සඳහා මේසය මත තිබිය යුතුය. සෑම පවුලකටම තමන්ගේම තාප මට්ටමක් ඇත. වයනය රළු විය යුතුය, සිනිඳු නොවිය යුතුය. නැවුම්ව සාදා තිබිය යුතුය - වැඩි කාලයක් ගබඩා කළහොත් සම්බෝලයේ රසය නැති වේ. මාලදිවයින් මාළු (උම්බලකඩ) අත්‍යාවශ්‍ය සහ ප්‍රතිස්ථාපනය කළ නොහැකි ය. වියළන ලද නොව නැවුම් නැවුම් පොල් භාවිතා කරන්න.
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: கிரிபாத் மேசையில் இருக்க வேண்டும். ஒவ்வொரு குடும்பத்திற்கும் அதன் சொந்த வெப்ப நிலை உள்ளது. அமைப்பு கரடுமுரடானதாக இருக்க வேண்டும், மென்மையாக இல்லை. புதிதாகத் தயாரிக்கப்பட வேண்டும் - அதிக நேரம் சேமித்து வைத்தால் சாம்போல் சுவையை இழக்கும். மாலத்தீவு மீன் (உம்பலகடா) அத்தியாவசியமானது மற்றும் ஈடுசெய்ய முடியாதது. தேங்காயைத் துருவிய தேங்காயைப் புதிதாகப் பயன்படுத்தவும், உலர்த்தாமல் இருக்கவும்.

recipes.name: Pani Pol (Treacle Pancake)
recipes.description: Coconut and treacle filled pancakes. Traditional New Year sweet.
ingredients: For pancake: 2 cups flour, 1 egg, 1 cup coconut milk, pinch salt
For filling: 2 cups grated coconut, 1 cup kithul treacle, 1/2 tsp cardamom
instructions: Make thin pancake batter with flour, egg, coconut milk, salt
Mix grated coconut with treacle and cardamom for filling
Place filling on half of each pancake
recipes.cultural_notes: Essential for Sinhala New Year. Kithul treacle is traditional - not palm sugar.
recipes.description_sinhala: පොල් සහ ට්‍රේකල් පිරවූ පෑන්කේක්. සාම්ප්‍රදායික අලුත් අවුරුද්ද මිහිරි.
recipes.description_tamil: தேங்காய் மற்றும் ட்ரெக்கிள் நிரப்பப்பட்ட அப்பத்தை. பாரம்பரிய புத்தாண்டு இனிப்பு.
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: සිංහල අලුත් අවුරුද්දට අත්‍යවශ්‍යයි. කිතුල් ට්‍රේකල් සාම්ප්‍රදායික - තල් සීනි නොවේ.
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: சிங்கள புத்தாண்டுக்கு இன்றியமையாதது. கித்துல் ட்ரீக்கிள் பாரம்பரியமானது - பனை சர்க்கரை அல்ல.

recipes.name: Kiri Hodi (Coconut Milk Gravy)
recipes.description: Mild coconut milk curry served with string hoppers. Morning favorite.
instructions: Boil thin coconut milk with turmeric, pandan, rampe (Never boil coconut milk vigorously - it will curdle)
Add onions and cook until soft
Add green chilies and curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Add thick coconut milk and salt
Add lime juice and remove from heat
recipes.cultural_notes: Never boil after adding thick coconut milk. Essential with string hoppers and sambol.
recipes.description_sinhala: මෘදු පොල් කිරි ව්‍යංජනය ඉඳිආප්ප සමඟ පිළිගැන්වේ. උදෑසන ප්රියතම.
recipes.description_tamil: மிதமான தேங்காய் பால் கறி சரம் தாளுடன் பரிமாறப்பட்டது. காலை பிடித்தது.
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ඝන පොල් කිරි එකතු කිරීමෙන් පසු කිසි විටෙකත් තම්බා නොගන්න. ඉඳිආප්ප සහ සම්බෝල සමඟ අත්‍යවශ්‍යයි.
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: கெட்டியான தேங்காய் பால் சேர்த்த பிறகு ஒருபோதும் கொதிக்க வேண்டாம். ஸ்ட்ரிங் ஹாப்பர்கள் மற்றும் சாம்போல் உடன் அவசியம்.

recipes.name: Kadala Curry (Chickpea Curry)
recipes.description: Spicy black chickpea curry. Perfect pairing with pittu or bread.
ingredients: 2 tbsp coconut oil (traditional - do not substitute)
instructions: Heat oil, add curry leaves and pandan (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Add onions and green chilies, sauté
Add all dry spices, fry well
recipes.cultural_notes: Must use black chickpeas, not white. Perfect partner for pittu. The curry should be thick and coating.
recipes.description_sinhala: සැර කළු කඩල කරිය. පිට්ටු හෝ පාන් සමඟ පරිපූර්ණ යුගලනය.
recipes.description_tamil: காரமான கருப்பு கொண்டைக்கடலை கறி. Perfect pairing with pittu or bread.
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: සුදු නොව කළු කඩල භාවිතා කළ යුතුය. පිට්ටු සඳහා පරිපූර්ණ සහකරු. ව්යංජන ඝන සහ ආලේපන විය යුතුය.
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: கருப்பு கொண்டைக்கடலை கண்டிப்பாக பயன்படுத்த வேண்டும், வெள்ளை அல்ல. பிட்டுக்கு சரியான துணை. கறி தடிமனாகவும் பூச்சும் இருக்க வேண்டும்.

recipes.name: Seeni Sambol (Caramelized Onion Sambol)
recipes.description: Sweet and spicy caramelized onion relish with Maldive fish. Breakfast favorite.
instructions: Heat oil and add cinnamon, cardamom, pandan
Add sliced onions and cook on medium heat
Add curry leaves and Maldive fish (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Add chili powder and chili flakes
Adjust seasoning and cool before storing
recipes.cultural_notes: Patience is key - must caramelize slowly. Stores for weeks. Essential with bread and string hoppers. Must be freshly made - sambol loses flavor if stored too long. Maldive fish (umbalakada) is essential and irreplaceable. Use coconut scraped fresh, not desiccated.
recipes.description_sinhala: මාලදිවයිනේ මාළු සමග පැණිරස හා සැර කැරමල් කළ ලූනු රස. උදෑසන ආහාරය ප්රියතම.
recipes.description_tamil: மாலத்தீவு மீனுடன் இனிப்பு மற்றும் காரமான கேரமல் செய்யப்பட்ட வெங்காயம். காலை உணவு பிடித்தது.
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ඉවසීම ප්රධාන වේ - සෙමින් කැරමල් කළ යුතුය. සති ගණනක් ගබඩා කරයි. පාන් සහ ඉඳිආප්ප සමග අත්‍යවශ්‍යයි. නැවුම්ව සාදා තිබිය යුතුය - වැඩි කාලයක් ගබඩා කළහොත් සම්බෝලයේ රසය නැති වේ. මාලදිවයින් මාළු (උම්බලකඩ) අත්‍යාවශ්‍ය සහ ප්‍රතිස්ථාපනය කළ නොහැකි ය. වියළන ලද නොව නැවුම් නැවුම් පොල් භාවිතා කරන්න.
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: பொறுமை முக்கியமானது - மெதுவாக கேரமல் செய்ய வேண்டும். வாரக்கணக்கில் கடைகள். ரொட்டி மற்றும் ஸ்ட்ரிங் ஹாப்பர்களுடன் அவசியம். புதிதாகத் தயாரிக்கப்பட வேண்டும் - அதிக நேரம் சேமித்து வைத்தால் சாம்போல் சுவையை இழக்கும். மாலத்தீவு மீன் (உம்பலகடா) அத்தியாவசியமானது மற்றும் ஈடுசெய்ய முடியாதது. தேங்காயைத் துருவிய தேங்காயைப் புதிதாகப் பயன்படுத்தவும், உலர்த்தாமல் இருக்கவும்.

recipes.name: Isso Thel Dala (Prawn Stir Fry)
recipes.description: Dry prawn stir fry with onions and spices. Rice puller specialty.
ingredients: 3 tbsp coconut oil (traditional - do not substitute)
instructions: Add curry leaves and onions (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Stir fry on high heat for 5 minutes
Cook until prawns are done and dry
recipes.cultural_notes: Must be dry, not gravy. High heat cooking preserves prawn texture. Called 'thel dala' meaning fried in oil.
recipes.description_sinhala: වියළි ඉස්සන් ලූනු සහ කුළු බඩු සමග ෆ්රයි ෆ්රයි. රයිස් අදින්න විශේෂත්වය.
recipes.description_tamil: உலர் இறாலை வெங்காயம் மற்றும் மசாலா சேர்த்து வறுக்கவும். ரைஸ் புல்லர் சிறப்பு.
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: හොදි නොව වියලි විය යුතුය. අධික තාප ආහාර පිසීම ඉස්සන් වයනය ආරක්ෂා කරයි. තෙල්වලින් බැදපු කියන අර්ථයෙන් ‘තෙල් දල’ කියලා.
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: குழம்பு அல்ல, உலர்ந்ததாக இருக்க வேண்டும். அதிக வெப்ப சமையல் இறால் அமைப்பை பாதுகாக்கிறது. எண்ணெயில் பொரித்தது என்று பொருள்படும் 'தெல் டாலா' என்று அழைக்கப்படுகிறது.

recipes.name: Aluwa (Sticky Toffee)
recipes.description: Sticky rice flour toffee with cashews. New Year essential sweet.
instructions: Roast rice flour lightly until fragrant
Make sugar syrup with water to soft ball stage
Cut into diamond shapes while warm
recipes.cultural_notes: Must be sticky and chewy. Pink color is traditional. Stores well in airtight containers.
recipes.description_sinhala: කජු සමග ඇලෙන සුළු හාල් පිටි ටොෆි. අලුත් අවුරුදු අත්යවශ්ය පැණිරස.
recipes.description_tamil: முந்திரியுடன் ஒட்டும் அரிசி மாவு டோஃபி. புத்தாண்டு இன்றியமையாத இனிப்பு.
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ඇලෙන සුළු හා චංචල විය යුතුය. රෝස පැහැය සාම්ප්රදායික වේ. වාතය රහිත බහාලුම්වල හොඳින් ගබඩා කර ඇත.
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: ஒட்டும் மற்றும் மெல்லியதாக இருக்க வேண்டும். இளஞ்சிவப்பு நிறம் பாரம்பரியமானது. காற்று புகாத கொள்கலன்களில் நன்றாக சேமிக்கப்படுகிறது.

recipes.name: Parippu (Red Lentil Curry)
recipes.description: Everyday red lentil curry with turmeric and coconut milk. Rice and curry staple.
ingredients: 2 tbsp coconut oil (traditional - do not substitute)
instructions: Wash lentils and boil with water and turmeric
Cook until lentils are soft and mushy
Add cumin, curry leaves, garlic, onion (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Add thin coconut milk and green chilies
Add thick coconut milk and salt
recipes.cultural_notes: Most common curry in Sri Lanka. Must be on every rice and curry spread. Comfort food.
recipes.description_sinhala: කහ සහ පොල් කිරි සමග දිනපතා රතු පරිප්පු කරිය. බත් සහ කරි ප්‍රධාන ආහාරය.
recipes.description_tamil: மஞ்சள் மற்றும் தேங்காய்ப்பால் தினமும் சிவப்பு பருப்பு கறி. சாதம் மற்றும் கறி பிரதான உணவு.
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: ශ්‍රී ලංකාවේ බහුලවම ව්‍යංජනය. සෑම බත් සහ ව්‍යංජන මත විය යුතුය. සුවපහසු ආහාර.
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: இலங்கையில் மிகவும் பொதுவான கறி. ஒவ்வொரு சாதம் மற்றும் கறி விரிப்பில் இருக்க வேண்டும். ஆறுதல் உணவு.

recipes.name: Wambatu Moju (Brinjal Pickle)
recipes.description: Sweet and sour brinjal pickle. Essential accompaniment for rice and curry.
instructions: Deep fry brinjal cubes until golden, drain
Heat little oil, add mustard seeds
Add curry leaves, onions, ginger, garlic (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Add fried brinjal and green chilies
recipes.cultural_notes: Balances spicy curries. Must be sweet-sour-spicy. Stores for 2 weeks refrigerated.
recipes.description_sinhala: පැණිරස හා ඇඹුල් බටු අච්චාරු. බත් සහ ව්‍යංජන සඳහා අත්‍යවශ්‍ය සහායකය.
recipes.description_tamil: இனிப்பு மற்றும் புளிப்பு பிரிஞ்சி ஊறுகாய். சாதம் மற்றும் கறிக்கு இன்றியமையாத துணை.
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: කුළුබඩු සහිත ව්‍යංජන සමතුලිත කරයි. පැණිරස-ඇඹුල්-කුළුබඩු විය යුතුය. සති 2 ක් ශීතකරණයේ ගබඩා කර තබයි.
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: காரமான கறிகளை சமப்படுத்துகிறது. இனிப்பு-புளிப்பு-காரமாக இருக்க வேண்டும். 2 வாரங்களுக்கு குளிர்சாதன பெட்டியில் சேமிக்கப்படுகிறது.

recipes.name: Talapa (Steamed Coconut Cakes)
recipes.description: Coconut treacle mixture steamed in kenda leaves. Village sweet treat.
instructions: Mix rice flour, coconut, and salt
Warm treacle and add to mixture
Add cardamom and mix to thick batter
Place spoonful of batter on each leaf
recipes.cultural_notes: Kenda leaf gives unique flavor. Village specialty. Often made for temple offerings.
recipes.description_sinhala: කැඳ කොළවල තැම්බූ පොල් ට්‍රේකල් මිශ්‍රණය. ගමේ රසකැවිලි.
recipes.description_tamil: கெண்டா இலைகளில் வேகவைக்கப்பட்ட தேங்காய் துருவல் கலவை. கிராமத்து இனிப்பு.
recipes.cultural_notes_sinhala: කැඳ කොළ අද්විතීය රසයක් ලබා දෙයි. ගමේ විශේෂත්වය. බොහෝ විට දේවමාළිගාවේ පූජා සඳහා සාදා ඇත.
recipes.cultural_notes_tamil: கெண்டை இலை தனிச் சுவையைத் தரும். கிராமத்தின் சிறப்பு. பெரும்பாலும் கோவில் பிரசாதத்திற்காக செய்யப்படுகிறது.
